column3: Ere anĩ wau laa fiya naig tafe ada keleĩ youf, are eig fiya. Jesus Kristus ĩ ada nigin yogon mata itoron. Anĩ nigin, adag turada tar nigin neda mata tatorõf bagai.

Pasa nẽ Sifa fau wõya sã mog, Jesus kelein, ĩ teneub enei itor ken, Tama garan ileya nẽ sain mogo wõ yel. Ĩ yogon tamo tar tenebur ein dibodok anidi nigin wau laa fedig, ĩ idi nigin wau laa fen are iroule idikeleya bun.
Negur aiyai nigin yar foti wau sanen? Idi mosor dino fen, gerere tuan gare den anidi nigin sã de?
Gere tar dõ fiya biya gen, sain ã neneya bun ubodõg fen, oroya sane ã walegen anĩ to dõ gouf.
Age fiya nigin, Negur ĩ tamo ganan, dõ fiya sã nẽ kafĩ fiya bun inenẽdin, are ĩ idi ganan wau yũya ifenẽdiyouf nigin age fen.

Age fe di, aya ereb mata ibodõya aiwa adodo atun ait taka gen karĩ aun are iron, “Naa tekelei nẽ mala solo wit bret tekelei yalouf, naa tekelei nẽ mala solo baali bret towo yalouf. Ago fen, oliv moul ado wain to daũ wo!”
Odug mala bun wauĩ ukesileg, ago ge di, ĩ ã yalesneĩf.
Ĩ naa inon anĩ bun, ĩ tamo igirnen ĩ bunem, teneub ganan madur fiya bun es fouf. Negur ĩ laa bun tamal mata kel turĩ fe di, fã yen anĩ bunem, enei agef wõ youf anĩ tamo ganan ifelnẽdin.”
Kusĩ tamo malũ duri ado dale, teter tanak kori de fen, ĩ mudur bun kurũ difiyen. Idi gabar kadaũ dale difounne ken,
Anĩ nigin, kayau waab fau gaũ, tamo dalouf, kesu adouf, nedi fõ el de lo difouf, kiwaim idi dumedin irõya nigin naab to dukenẽdiyouf anĩ aya orouf.
Aya Dei bun abodok, Dei ĩ aya bun ibodok anĩ, momoi wiyagauf, sãf are, aya kabĩ aledig bun, momoi wiyagauf.
Age fe di, laa ado Hades, ku kolili fiya yã bobo reya ado bun geif iraran. Ku kolili fiya yã bobo reya ado, are laa uyulil isin anĩ dõ fiya laa anĩ.

Kristus ĩ age fem are, teneub kare fiya sain bunem isin are, ĩ sain musei darau yalem. Anĩ ere, gama idikeleya sain enei bun, ĩ yogo bouwa sesewi fe fen, mosor yalelauf nigin, sain tekelei dogol wõ yen.
Negur ĩ, foti yar age fiya gerere tuan, idi tobonunã sane age difen anĩ lolou fesif isin.
Anĩ nigin, neu turau tar, sain ã yõya nigin guru gouf are, ã abob nigin tari gouf.

Aya ĩ ĩtãfiya uris anĩ dõ fiya fara fel mog, ailen. Age fe di, mimĩ odug wõ yen. Gaa gugum kel fen, wau gudũ fiya nẽ gabar meme siwi nem iwaya gen karos kelen. Ogõ oditekei naud giriya gen falei felen.
Kayau dogo neid tar gare dedin, baban mata ke de fafã de di, daledin. Tunĩ darau sane bagai dale fen, kafĩ fiya bun tamal yalelnẽdiya ditoron, are idi kel fãya biya anĩ, dalouf nigin age difen.

Anĩ ere, Pol kabĩ tamo irokenẽdin, “Amã Rom tamo ba, anĩ ere, idi to es difama ken, amã mal atun wagagã difaman. Age dife fen, amã kalabus bun dinenaman. Anĩ gama idi iminẽyan dirumã fenẽ de? Sã! Idi dogo disi, dalisnama ken, dinenamãf.”

Ĩtãfiya eig ye irok, “Seseirã to uno,” “Tamo to ukeis,” “Bẽ to ule,” “Taka nẽ safina to malã ile orouf,” ĩtãfiya eneidi ado ereb lo tunĩ ifaredif are, ĩtãfiya tekelei eneim ganan irouf, “Õ ogo nigin waũ laa fef gen, nẽ tã nigin ago waũ laa fouf.”
Aib taka ĩ bun wau iseya anĩ ado, ĩ karẽtut bagai gen, ĩ yogo karẽtut ouf.
Ere nigin, aya nameun Negur nẽ lo nigin wau kulĩ yedig,
Sain ganan Odug bun wauĩ kulĩ youf. Aya baban arokeneik: Wauĩ kulĩ ye!
Aya ait wogõ fiyan anĩ ileya nigin falei aun. Aya falei aul fen, lam nẽ gol tutur sewen ailedin.
Negur aiyai nigin wau kuturol fen, idi yogon si inoya bun to bagai dilauf yen? Idi yogon od to dõ difen anidi nigin sã de?
Ganan uyulil disin are, idi bẽ tamo, bẽ daledig, anĩ ere, sipsip idi to karĩ difiyẽdin.
Ferfer ã, aniniya ganan ado ãgenei odudug farumen ubodõgouf, idi biya fen, waud yũdig anidi dogol farumen sã, idi wau morõ difeneĩdig anidig farumen ubodõgouf.
Idi, tamo tunĩ idegẽya od wogõ douf nigin, guri de disi di, diron, “Tamo enei faimud sigor taka to ifõdig, Negur nẽ tempel enei nigin ado, Moses nẽ Lo nigin, kiwai od wogõ yedig.
Enei ganan Negur bun tamal, ĩ Kristus bunem ada ĩ geid komo fada fen, komo fiya nẽ kabĩ anĩ ada ifanadan.
Turau tar, profet Odug nẽ yana bun wogõ den anidi, darau bun feseya sã difaren gen ãg ago gouf.
Age fe di, aib taka ĩ, Odug yana yale iweignẽf are, Odug ĩ kel yalouf.’
Idi diron: “Momoi! Yana yaleseya, fula fiya medeĩya, kisi biya, de fiyẽya, yana odug, megeir ado, totol are neda Negur bun gai gai ibodkalauf. Momoi!”
Ãgenei meli meli, mayarẽ naki anĩ, fatiya korif ifõya, gol sai ifonũya be, kolos biya ifonũya age fediya bunem to isiyouf.
Anĩ nigin, õ neda Odug kurõ fesiya nigin õ to mama yõf, aya ĩ nigin kalabus bun abodok nigineg to mama yõf. Anĩ ere, Negur nẽ megeir bunem, õ aya ado bagu ta fen, biya od nigin darau talouf.
Idi nigin, aya yug adok bagai afonok, are idig momoi bagai dogo adok Negur difenẽf nigin.
Fã wale! Ereb mogo laa fou fenẽ anĩ megeir wenẽ, ere nigin, aya õ ereb agof are neu Negur nẽ mala bun tutuk bagai sã ailef.
Anĩ dõ fiya engel taka, yogon beĩ, naan odudug ado naan warur anidi bun fi felen, age fe di, naud falei feledin.
Neda momoiya bunem, Jesus Kristus ĩ, ada Negur nẽ wau ifenẽya enei ada gama an tafaref anĩ namen irou ileda di, telen. Anĩ nigin, ada Negur nẽ fula fiya medeĩya nigin, wauda ise fen, kulĩ taudig.

Ere nigin, ã momoi bagai enei keleĩ: Tamo noli tobonunã ado, amuyẽ ado be, safina musei youf nigin ima su lai fe fen sũ we fiya (tamo age fiya are idegẽya waitou yana yaleseya tamo), ĩ Kristus ado Negur nẽ tano bun akor to yalouf.
Negur ĩ, Abraham yogon akor fau yalouf modoũ bun ilauf nigin iweignen sain bun, Abraham ĩ nain be ilauf ya anĩ keleĩ san. Anĩ ere, ĩ momoiya bunem Negur nẽ od dõf fen, ilen.
Ã wain musei to wõ ge di, meleĩ waĩ youf, are bouwa nẽ oroya nigin totol sane wau fãya bun irouleyeĩf. Age fiya ban, Awa Uurem nameĩ isokosauf.
Musei dogo neid tobonuneid sane dõ de fen, momoi nẽ naab are naabura gudũ difouf.
Ĩ bunem, ada uruwom Awa Uur tekelei bunem, Tamada wagen ileya kisi feleya.

Haiden tamo kayau idi momoi den anidi bun, amã kisi mafon anĩ matotkenẽdin, are idi saaf idegẽya waitou bun sesewi difen anĩ to dãf, yaro naud adodo to dãf, yaro uleid kakã difeid fen, didenkesif anĩ to dãf ado, noli tobonunã bun to dilauf.”
Age fe di, Pita iron, “Ananias, naig fe di, Satan waũ bun isokose di, Awa Uur Fateul udegne ken, moni teneub nẽ walen anĩ tunĩ ogon nigin urouf?

Age tafouf, ada baban momou gen to tabodõf, maaĩ moloun wĩya gen to age ta fen, tai fiya ganan, tamo neid beugya ado, idegẽya tamo neid kisi anidim, yaum fũ fe di, aarau ilef isif fedig gen, to wewu fadauf.

Tamo tobonunã sesen idi, Negur nẽ tano to akorouf anĩ, ã to keleĩ de? Are ã idi to utornẽdige di, didegneĩf. Idi noli tobonunã dinodig, idi idegẽya waitou yana dalesedig, idi seseirã tobonunã dinodig, tamo idi bouweid na nẽ sur difedig, tamo tutur, kayau tutur noli tobonunã dinodig,
Ada guru fiya anĩ to tatorõf, tunĩ to guru difedig gen, to age tafouf, anĩ ere, ada abob wau talesef talauf, ere nigin, ã, Odug nẽ Naa melsã isif are ulegef.

Anĩ nigin, ereb ereb ãgenei tenebur nẽ oroya nẽ anĩ udenkesig: noli tobonunã, amuyẽ tobonunã, noli kisi, oroya sesen ado, safina musei youf nigin ima su lai fe fen sũ we fiya (are idegẽya waitou seli yabiya).
Anĩ ere, ada we nẽ nigin, ada dug nigin karĩ ado fen, momoiya wau laa fiya ado siot kapa gen tafoun ken, kel gei fiya nẽ wau iseya anim hat kapa gen kurũ tafouf.
Negur ada kumĩ nẽ uur to ifanadan, anĩ ere, megeir nẽ, wau laa fiya nẽ ado, ada dug kulatun fiya nẽ uur ifanadan.
Tamo ĩ aya ĩ keleĩ ye fen, ereb ĩ irok anĩ to dõ fouf are, ĩ idegẽya tamo, agef fen, momoi anĩ ĩ bun to ibodok.
neu wau kulĩya anĩ, wauĩ tekelei, wauĩ laa fiya tekelei, uur ado kisi bun tekelei bunem tobol ge di, neu wau kulĩya barikãf.
Od enei bun, idi ĩ dirounẽf nigin age difen, anĩ ere, taka nem ĩ bun ima to inon, ere nigin, yogon sain fau isiya sã.
Idi tobonunã biya age dife di, tobonunã biya inid ado dibodõf nigin, dor yaleya nigin ado, ne tã isennẽya nigin urokenẽdiyouf.
Idi solo de diron, “Ĩ lo wal fiya tamo sam are, amã õ gein to marou masim.”

Taka ĩ naa taka anĩ odug gen ilef, Odug nigin ye fen, ĩ age fef. Age fiya gen, taka ĩ yaro muda yoko, Odug nigin ye fen, yoko, ere nigin, ĩ Negur de fiyek. Taka ĩ ereb ereb tunĩ yõya nigin itorok, ĩ Odug nigin ye fen, agef fen, Negur de fiyek.
Wau iseya bun wauĩ kulĩ youf, morõ bun megeir ufaragauf, toku kosẽ gouf.
Ĩ, Pol lo difouf, anĩ ere, ĩ karika difen ken, yogon mou tar ĩ ereb lau fef anĩ kulatun difouf nigin yo fiyẽdiyouf nigin, kusĩ tamo neid orowa irokenen.
Ĩ faimud kulatun fedig, ĩ faimud momoi yedig, ĩ faimud wau isedig, ĩ faimud feseya sã megeir ifaredig.
Negur nẽ Itotoya eig yef, “Aya momoi aun, anĩ nigin, aya wogõ aun.” Momoiya de tekelei anĩ nẽ kisi bunem, amãg momoi mauf, anĩ nigin, amãg wogõ mauf,
Turamã tar, amã totol bagai marokeneik, fõ temeleid wedereid uroug, anini temeleid waud waleseg fen, forõ temeleid usennẽdigouf, ganan nigin nameĩ ukeleg ubodõgouf.
Anĩ dõ fiya engel taka, yogon beĩ gaar kuĩ nẽ king nẽ sia bun fi fele di, yogon tano gugum kelen. Tamo idi darau nigin baleid mũ de fen,
Wau inosiya ado wau yũya, idi od enei mogo wogõ aul anĩ dõ difef anidi ganan bun isiyouf, Negur nẽ Israel tamo kayau buneg isiyouf.
Ĩ Odug nẽ naab anĩ difelnen, age dife di, ĩ totol ado wogõ ye fen, Jesus nigin tutuk bagai ifelnẽdidig, anĩ ere, ĩ Jon nẽ naan igũya anĩ dogol kelein.
Anĩ ere, ã saaf wãgauf, naan wãgauf ado, ereb ereb ganan ago gouf are, Negur nẽ fula fiya medeĩya nigin anĩ ganan ago gouf.

Ã nigin, Awa Uur Fateul ã ĩ bun tamal walegen are, ã bun ibodok, age fe di, aib takam ã ifelneĩya nigin lau fiya taka to ibodok. Anĩ ere, yogon Awa Uur Fateul anim, ereb ereb ganan nigin ã ifelneĩdig. Age fe di, Awa Uur Fateul anĩ momoi bagai, idegẽya sã, anĩ nigin, ã ifelnein kilei anĩ, ĩ bun ubodõgouf.
Bouwa uur sã are laa fef age fiya gen, momoiya dõ fiya sã are laa fef.
Pol od enei wogõ yel fen, idi ganan meleid bun, ĩ bret tunĩ yale, Negur de fiyekel fen, mũf gariya ino yon.

Age fiya ban, ada pas tatot fen, idi saaf idegẽya waitou bun sesewi difen anĩ to dãf nigin, noli tobonunã bun to dilauf nigin, yaro uleid kakã difeid fen, didenkesif anĩ to dãf nigin ado, yaro naud adodo to dãf nigin torokenẽdiyouf.
Age ye di, Pol Ananias irokenen, “Negur õ inõ irãf, õ pen lalaum garaĩ naki fiya! Õ lo kilei es wiyauf nigin an ubodok, anĩ ere, õ lo wal wo fen, aya dinauf nigin urokenẽdif!”
Anĩ nigin, idi Kristus Jesus bun dibodok anidi bun, mosor dinon nigin bou yũya taka gama to ibodok,
Negur ada didi yaleya nigin to igirnadan, anĩ ere, ada neda Odug Jesus Kristus bunem kel gei fadauf nigin igirnadan.
ĩ tamo kayau teneub ganan bun idegnẽdiyouf nigin, teneub idĩyan aiwa adodo, are Gog ado Magog bun ile fen, idi kusĩ bun ileya nigin gou fediyouf. Idi neid namba are, maaĩ ubun mumul ifaref age fiya.
Are ã tunĩ age fiya anĩ ago gedig. Anĩ ere, ã mosor bun tamal kulo yein, are ã fateul inenein, are ã, Odug Jesus Kristus yana bun ado neda Negur nẽ Awa Uur bunem, Negur mala bun madur bagai wowã gen.

Age fiya nigin, aya darau enei alef, anĩ ere, aya to mama fiyaf, ere nigin, aya aib nigin momoi aun are aya keleĩ, Odug nẽ naa anĩ nigin, ereb aya ĩ kulatun fouf nigin afenen are, ĩ lo fiya kisi feleya are aya keleĩ.
Kosẽya ado to fiya ganan bun, sain ganan Awa Uur bun kosẽ gouf. Enei kisi bun unog fen, saika ge fen, sain ganan Negur nẽ tamo kayau ganan nigin kosẽ gouf.
Pol, Sailas, Timoti, amã, Tesalonika sios Tamada Negur, Odug Jesus Kristus ado bun ufaregef ã bun, pas enei matotof: Wau ifenẽya wau inosiya ado ã bun ibodõf.
Ãgenei molol anĩ tamo ganan bun yaor gouf. Odug ĩ mogo melsak.
Ere nigin, sain ganan ã bret enei wõg fen, kap enei bun wãgauf, ã Odug nẽ laa nigin kurõ wesig mog, ĩ fau isiyouf.
Age fe di, momoiya bunem kosẽ def anim dagi tamo el fiyẽdig. Odug ĩ yalesnẽf. Ĩ mosor inon ouf are, in mosor nigin weder tu kalauf.
Aya õ nigin, toku bõ ado gaa ado, neu kosẽ bun karĩ aul fen, aya, neu talik tar age difen gen, Negur mala bun kisi karẽ bunem, Negur aruna aledig anĩ, de afiyek.
Idi arei ado sa diweig dirokenẽdin, “Tetenaman kubũg fen, ĩ king nẽ sia bun ibodok anĩ nawa ado Sipsip Naal nẽ didi bun tamal unokolnamãg!

Taka ĩ weder adouf, utornẽg len, ĩ Awa Uur sios irokenẽdif anĩ karĩ youf. Aib ĩ kusĩ anĩ wal fouf, aya ĩ mana iminẽyan ibodok tunĩ afenẽf. Aya ĩ meein lalau takag, yana mata teten itoton anĩ afenẽf. Aib ĩ anĩ yalef dogol yana anĩ keleĩ youf.
Dogo naumeid nigin, tise eneidi nenerĩ dogo neid kisim wogõ diyei ken, safineĩ gei difouf. Negur idi mogo es fedin, agef fen, idi daũ fediya nẽ are mogo isiyouf.
Age fiya nigin, Negur idegẽya totol sur fe di, idi anĩ nigin momoi douf.
Are Negur nẽ Itotoya bun ibodok kilei, “Ã bunem, haiden atun Negur yana kono difiyek.”
Janes Jambres ado Moses kiwai difenen gen, tamo enidig momoi anĩ kiwai difenek, tamo anidi kisi gelele fiya ado, momoiya sã nigin itornẽdin.
Aya idi nigin wau laa fedig anidi, aya ou afeid fen, tai afedidig. Anĩ nigin, kabĩ totol wale fen, mosor utor ken, waũ falei wouf.
Anĩ nigin, momoiya bunem, Negur ada madur bagai yen nigin, ada neda Odug Jesus Kristus bunem, Negur ado maror bun tabodok.
Õ ogo nigin ado ogon ifelnẽdiya nigin lo walauf. Anĩ feseya sã toku agouf, anĩ bunem, õ ogo ado idi karĩ diyõf anidi isennẽya walogouf.

Sain musei, aya idi darau afenẽdiyouf nigin, Juda neid uub fõ fõ bun elen, age afe fen, idi Negur kono difiyẽf nigin nugo afiyẽdin. Aya idi nigin nameu sane bagai yen ken, aya idi kafĩ fiya afenẽdiyouf nigin yaũ tauneg elen.
Bouwa nẽ oroya nẽ tobonunã are yaor: noli tobonunã, amuyẽ ado, bouwa nẽ oroya nigin totol sane wau fãya;
Anĩ nigin, faat itenẽya tamo ado naan fiya tamo are ege, anĩ ere, Negur ĩ yogo dogol odug, ere nigin, ĩ ereb odugouf nigin age fedig.
Anĩ nigin, ã neda Odug Jesus Kristus yaorouf nigin wauĩ fatuk unog fen, tarig mog, ã Awa Uur nẽ ege luwa taka to lau gef.
Age afe fen, aya ait taka saa ilunem, naan fatuk wĩ ye fen, gou redig gen ado, kolimei gudũya odug gen karĩ aun. Ait aya karĩ aun are, harp kodẽya tamo harp kodẽ dedig gen.
Profet ganan ĩ nigin kurõ difeis wogõ den, are taka ĩ Jesus nigin momoi youf are, Jesus yana bunem yogon mosor nigin weder tu kalauf.”
Idi feseya sã ereb biya age difen bunem, fula fiya medeĩya, yana ado, to bura leya dimirẽdig anidi, mata ibodkeleya ifenẽdiyouf.
Aya Jon, Asia provins bun sios sewen bun pas enei atotof. Negur ĩ gama ibodok, kulu ibodon, dumen isiyouf bunem, uur sewen yogon king nẽ sia wagen difaref bunem ado,
Pol iron, “Jon nẽ naan igũya are wau faleiya nẽ naan igũya. Jon ĩ yogo, dumen tamo taka isif ĩ nigin momoi douf nigin, tamo kayau irokenẽdin, tamo are Jesus.”
Age fiyauf are, Odug ĩ naig fe fen, tamo Negur nẽ dibodok anidi, morõ bun tamal yalelneĩd fen, tamo Negur nẽ to dibodok anidi, darau bun irounẽdif ile, es fiya nẽ naa bun ileya nigin anĩ keleĩ.
Age fiya ban, idi teneub biya bagai, saa ilun nẽ anĩ nigin waud yenen. Anĩ nigin, Negur ĩ, idi nemã Negur def anĩ nigin to mama fef, ere nigin, ĩ idi neid taun taka dodok felen.
Negur ditoron anĩ nẽ od ado kayau tubau neid nenerĩ ege anĩ to urou, Negur nẽ tobonunã dõ fiya biya wõ wouf nigin, õ ogo tai wouf.
Idi teneub modoũ odug bun dile fen, Negur nẽ tamo kayau neid modoũ ado, taun Negur anĩ nigin wau laa fedig anĩ salili difen. Anĩ ere, yã saa ilunem isi fen, idi yakur feidlen.
Anĩ nigin, Pita, idi Jesus yana bunem naan digunẽdiyouf nigin irokenẽdin. Age fe di, Pita idi geid naa tunĩ dibodõf nigin idi Pita dirokenen.
õ ogo nigin momoi wof, are õ mala ifofakeleya neid ulum irouya tamo, õ idi gugum bun difaref anidi neid lalan,
Agef fen, enei anĩ ereb ĩ age afouf fadan, are mata ibodkeleya.
Anĩ ere, kisi biya saa ilunem isif are, uyulil karẽtut, age fe di, maror nigin wau laa fiya, molol, abob karĩ fiyẽya, wau yũya barikã ado, faat biya yũya, anĩ kinau ya sã ado, mala yaleya sã.
Tama ĩ Naal nigin wau laaf fen, ereb ereb ganan ĩ ima bun inon.
Odug ĩ, yogon promis od kisi falauf nigin, tunĩ age dedig gen, to foi yedig. Ĩ taka daũ feleyan ileya itor ken, ganan waud falei fouf nigin, sain meluk tari yeĩdig.
Tamo ganan aya gen dibodok, are aya orouf. Anĩ ere, tamo mugu mugu idi, Negur bun dogo neid ege luwa dalef, taka ege luwa enei, taka ege luwa anĩ.
Wau laa fiya nẽ naab dõg fen, Awa Uur nẽ ege luwa yaleya nigin kisi totol walogouf, Awa Uur nẽ ege luwa bun profet od wogõya nẽ anĩ bagai walogouf.
Negur ĩ iron, “Gugum namen lalan fula fei,” yen, inim Kristus nẽ nawa bun yogon fula fiya medeĩya anĩ, amã keleĩ youf nigin, yogon lalan waumã bun fula fouf nigin inon.
Sain anĩ bun, Juda tamo taka yana Apolos, Aleksandria fõ morou, Efesus isin. Ĩ keleĩ biya ado tamo, Negur nẽ Itotoya bun ibodok anĩ nigin keleĩ biya bagai ado.
Anĩ nigin, Jesus ĩg yogon naud bunem, tamo kayau neid mosor yalelauf nigin, taun bobog dumeitur darau faali fen.
Ereb ereb enei õ ufelnẽdiyouf. Ogon totol ganan bunem, idi neid waud wales fen, wedereid urou. To loloum weid len, õ lai diyõf.
Negur nẽ wau laa fiya eig fe ifelnadan. Ĩ yogon Naal tekelei bagai, ada ĩ bunem mata tabodõf nigin, tenebur sur fen.

“Dei, idi õ aya wanan anidi, aya abodok nẽ an, aya geid mabodõf anĩ orouf, are idi neu fula fiya medeĩya dilouf nigin, fula fiya medeĩya anĩ teneub kare fiya sã mog, õ aya nigin waũ laaf fen, wanan anĩ.
idi neid iyõya bun, daũ fiya ado morõ dinodig,
Anĩ nigin, pris mudur odug saa ilun Negur gein iselen, are Jesus Negur Naal, ada ĩ ado nigin, ada momoiya kurõ tafesif anĩ tarou kafĩ tafalauf.

Ait are Negur fula fiya medeĩya megeir ado bunem ĩ bun isi fen, iron, “Eĩ neu Kesu, ĩ nigin aya wau laa fedig, ĩ nigin aya wau kulĩ yedig,” sain anĩ bun, ĩ, Tama Negur bunem, yana odug ado fula fiya medeĩya yalen.
Enei ganan Awa Uur tekelei dogol ĩ yogon kabĩ, ĩ yogon oroya dõf fen, tamo kayau mugu mugu anĩ ifenẽdidig.

Anĩ dõ fiya engel taka yogon taur wese fe di, gaa faraf towo fiya gen anĩ taka, ogõ faraf towo fiya gen anĩ taka ado, barisa faraf towo fiya gen anĩ taka yũ di, idi ganan faraf towo fiya gen anĩ taka gugum kelen. Naa faraf towo fiya gen anĩ taka lalan sa kelen, agef fen, bõ faraf towo fiya gen anĩ takag age fen.
Age fe di, idi Juda neid uub fõ mudur Sostenes dale fen, kot fofomala bun dun. Anĩ ere, Galio to eweid yon.
Idi baban Jesus ka difiyẽf nigin age difen, anĩ ere, ĩ oreis iyawon.
Anĩ nigin, amã waumã to folo redig. Amã bouwamã buru foinenem ilumuk iledig, anĩ ere, amã nameman naa ganan bun mataya tobol fe iledig.
Age de mog, Maria moul sumeĩ biya, hap lita nad nem dinon, are moni odug nẽ anĩ yale fen, Jesus ye bun fi fel fen, fatiyam ye waĩ fen. Age fe di, moul sumeĩ biyam, fõ anĩ ino yalen.

Momoiya bunem, Abraham ĩ, Negur afonõf yen teneub anĩ bun, yaũ teneub bun yaũ tamo gen ibodon. Ĩ salafat bun ibodon, Isak Jakop ado, idi Negur afonõf yen od tekelei Abraham yalen anĩ dalen, idig salafat bun dibodon.
Turau tar, ã tunĩ geid bagug fen, aya dõ wiyagauf, agog fen, ã, idi amã tobonunã mafelnein bun difaref anidi dõ wedigouf.
Abob nẽ morõ faali ge, agog fen, naab anĩ bunem, Kristus nẽ lo anĩ ã bun kisi falauf.
Anĩ bun, õ ulef, are tamo ĩ ereb age fef anĩ bunem, Negur ĩ nigin madur bagai yef, momoiya dogol bunem sã.
Age fiyauf are, ada ere tauf? Negur madur sã de? Sã bagai!
Taka ĩ momoiya felu ref are waleg fen, yogon keleĩ ã geid tekelei sã nigin to monẽ wiyẽgouf.
Agef fen, saa ilun kusĩ wõ yen. Maikel yogon engel geid, gogour odug geid kusĩ den. Age fe di, gogour odug, yogon engel geid, abag idi geid kusĩ den.
“Ãgenei seyeya bun, mosor to unog.” Ã wauĩ bun to seye yef ile, gaa kuru kalauf.
Sane anĩ sane bunem be, kono fiya anĩ kono fiya bunem to solo gouf, anĩ ere, el fiya bunem solo gouf, ere nigin, ã ago ge di, el fiya anĩ walogouf nigin, ã enei bun iweignein.
Aya sur fiyan ĩ, amã urom mabodok, ĩ mugu to itornal, ere nigin, aya faimud, ereb ĩ wau al fouf anĩ, age afedig.”
Anĩ nigin, totol ufareg, momoi nẽ lũ luweĩ gug fen, madur bagai nẽ siot kapam akoreĩ dedeg,
Barisa sewen aya imau biyalẽ ulen ado, lam nẽ gol tutur sewen ulen anĩ nẽ waa nẽ gariya, are eig fiya: Barisa sewen are sios sewen neid engel, lam nẽ tutur sewen are sios sewen.

Anĩ ere, Jesus Negurem ĩ sain naal engel farumedin inene ken, ĩ darau yale laa fen nigin, gama ĩ fula fiya medeĩya yana ado anĩ nẽ teter kurũ fiyen anĩ ada tailef, are Negur nẽ wau ifenẽya bunem, ĩ tamo kayau ganan nigin laa ilen.
ere nigin, Negur nẽ kisi biya kilei, ã kisig fen, dõ gouf nigin, Negur ĩ ã namein kabĩ yaledig.
Aya enei arokeneim, are neu kulĩya ã namein ibod ken, ãgenei kulĩya barikãf nigin.
Aya, Pol, Negur neda Isennadaya ado Kristus Jesus neda wauda iseya neid nigiya od bunem Kristus Jesus nẽ aposel wõ aun,

Takag, aya kayau kolos biya, taka mama ifenẽya nẽ ani sã, tamo kayau nẽ lo fiya biya bun ifonũya anĩ orouf, fatiya kori fiya sã, gol sã, maaĩ tuwa meli bagai pel nẽ kilelei sã, meein odug nẽ kolos sã anĩ orouf.

Anĩ ile fen, ĩ malũ nem wip inon, agef fen, tempel modoũ bun tamal, sipsip ado bulmakau ganan irudi di, serẽ dilelen, ĩ moni solo fiya tamo neid koin moni daũf firagagaũ fe fen, ĩ dogo neid tebol yale, falei feledin.
Ada Negur nẽ imaba, kabĩ biya talouf nigin Kristus Jesus bun ada kare fadan, kabĩ biya are Negur ada age tafouf nigin uruwa bun mogo dodok fanadan.
Turau tar oboiyou, ã darau yã isaĩneĩ geneg gama walegef anĩ nigin, ereb urug ã bun wõya gen to terẽ gouf.
Ada wauda kulĩ ye, wauda al fe fen, fula fiya medeĩya tafenẽf! Ere nigin, Sipsip Naal kayau yaleya nẽ naa mogo isin, age fe di, yogon kayau mois mogo yogo nigin dodok fen.
Agog fen, kel yaleya nẽ hat kapa ado Awa Uur nẽ dimig, are Negur nẽ od, anĩ waleg.
Moses ĩ, idi neid taka Isip tamom to biya fiyẽ mog, ilen, anĩ nigin, ĩ Israel tura isenne ken, aba solof Isip tamo anĩ yukesin.
Aug nigin, turamã tar, biya ago gouf nigin to fõ yeĩf.
Lo welegei, momoiya bun totol ufareg, tamo totol ado kumĩ sã wõg, totol waleg.

Ã idegẽya waitou Molek nẽ salafat unog fen, ãgenei waitou Refan nẽ barisa yana walesegen, are idegẽya waitou ã selid wabidigouf nigin unodigen. Anĩ nigin, aya ã ãgenei teneub bun tamal alelnei ken, oun Babilon kantri ubodõgouf nigin sur ayeĩf.’
Anĩ nigin, turamã tar, megeir ufareg fen, sigoramam wogõya bunem ado pas bunem, mafelnein anĩ uroug kafĩ walagauf.
Negur ĩ enei nigin bagai ada inoda fen, ada wauda bun, ereb isiyouf anĩ momoi bagai isiyouf ye fen, Awa Uur iben.
Kayau ĩ foro yel dẽ yesil fen, dõ fouf anĩ bunem keleĩ yalouf.
Uyu irouya taka nigin bouwa yũya od to urouwauf, fau uruwom be towom dirõ di, anĩ urouwauf.
Abob fateul bunem umã wiyẽg fen, aan wiyẽgouf. Kristus nẽ sios ganan ã bun aanya sur difef.

Idi aas mudureid bun digu ken, waud gudũ fe di, inã logur fen, diweig dirõf: “ ‘Malalon! Malalon, O taun odug, an idi maaĩ bun waag adon ganan, yogon safina odug bunem safina musei dalen! Aua tekelei bun, are daũ felen!
Tamada, ada bun, wau laa fiya fatuk bagai ifanadan, anĩ nigin, Negur, ada in gere tar yedig. Are ada age fiya. Teneub enei ada nigin keleĩ sã, ere nigin, teneub enei ĩ nigin keleĩ sã.

Age fiya bagai, kesu oosi ã, biyeid uyu irouya farumen ubodõgouf. Ã ganan, abob nigin wauĩ yukesileya anĩ ufonũgouf, ere nigin, “Negur ĩ yeneid dalesef anidi kiwai gen iledidig, anĩ ere, ĩ waud yukesileya anidi wau ifenẽdidig.”

To bagai agef ilauf! Negur ĩ momoi bagai, age fe di, tamo ganan idegẽya temeleid tauf. Are Negur nẽ Itotoya bun ibodok kilei, “Are sain õ wogõ wouf bun, õ madur bagai anĩ yaorouf, sain õ es diyõf bun, õ wal wediyouf nigin.”
Ĩ, tamo kayau ganan õ yana seli dabidig anidi, kafĩ fiya bun inenẽdiyouf nigin, pris odudug bun tamal megeir yale fen, ein isin.”

Anĩ ere, tamo kayau atun idegẽya profeteg difaren, age fiya gen, ã atun idegẽya tiseg dibodõf. Idi fau tamo kayau daũ fediya nẽ idegẽya od anĩ iminẽyan difelneĩf, Odug na yaledin ĩ anĩ wa de fen, idi dogo bun kaisã bagai daũ feidleya anĩ dinouf.
Jesus age yen nigin, Juda tamo idi ĩ dukesiyouf nigin kabĩ totol dalen, Sabat naa nẽ lo wal fiya bun nigin dogol sã, ĩ Negur nigineg neu Dei ye fen, aya Negur ado tekelei yen nigin.
Aya ã yeneĩ alesef, ere nigin, ã ereb ereb ganan bun aya nigin karĩ weleg fen, ifelnẽya anĩ aya ale fen, ã afenein anĩ, kafĩ weleg uroug usigef.
Are Dawid ĩ nigin iron: “ ‘Odug sain faimud malau bun ifar mog, ailedig. Ĩ aya imau biyalem ibodok nigin, aya to kumĩ au fen, terẽ auf.
Ere nigin, ã bura leya nẽ faat bunem sã, to bura leya nẽ faat bunem baban gõ yein, are Negur nẽ od mata ibod ken, faimud ibodkeleya anĩ bunem age fen.
Anĩ nigin, ãgenei mosor nigin abob mala bun kurõ wesig fen, abob nigin kosẽ ge di, ã karika walogouf. Madur tamo nẽ kosẽya are megeir ado fen, kabĩ yaledig.
Aya ã momoi bagai arokeneik, taka ĩ momoi yef, mata faimud ibodkeleya ado.
Aya ã madmad gen to atorneĩf. Aya ã gein asiyouf.
Naab ganan bun musei! Uruwa bagai, Negur nẽ od idi kulatun difouf nigin imeid bun inon.
Ferfer, ã Kristus dõ gounẽ gen, tenebur ein ãgenei marau tamo, kumĩ ado aniniya ado, wauĩ adok bunem sigoreid dõ gouf.
Õ, Negur nẽ biya fiya õ waũ faleiya bun irouyõ isif anĩ to kelei ken, yogon biya fiya, molol ado, feseya sã, idi kisi feleya bagai anĩ, õ kono wof de?
Negur mala bun, ada kumĩ sã totol ado anĩ eig fiya. Ada yogon oroya dõ tafe fen, ereb taka nigin to tafiyẽf are, ĩ ada karĩ fadauf.

Wau iseya nẽ Negur, ã Negur momoi wiyẽg mog, wau kulĩya ado wau inosiya ganan, ã namein fi fele di, ise isokosauf, anĩ bunem, ã bun Awa Uur Fateul nẽ megeir bunem wauĩ iseya gogũ fouf nigin aya orouf.
Jesus aa tetek bun dun nẽ modoũ an, kabĩ taka ado, kabier an, ku mata taka ado, taka an to goro difen.

Anĩ ere, gaar kuĩ are dale diroun, age de fen, idegẽya profet, ĩ memelik nẽ uris gaar kuĩ mala bun inodin anĩg, gaar kuĩ ado dale diroun. Uris anidi bunem, ĩ, idi gaar kuĩ nẽ uris dalen anidi ado, idi yogon malakanon yana dalesedig anidi idegnẽdin. Idi urom mata dibod mog, ku kolili fiya meein salfa yã bobo reya barikã ado bun, gei de diraran.
Age fiya ban, Negur nẽ Itotoya bun eig ya ibodok, “Ogon kiwai naũ fouf are, saaf wenẽ yãf, ĩ naan ail fouf are, naan wenẽ yãf. Anĩ agouf bun, ĩ yogon ereb sane age fen nigin mama sane falauf.”

Utorõg len, Kristus nẽ od fatuk bagai ã namein ibodõ di, ã kisi biya ganan bunem abob ufelnẽdig fen, abob weder urougauf, agog fen, od Negur nẽ Itotoya Sam bun ibodok, Negur yana yaleseya seg ado, uur nẽ seg, ãgenei wauĩ bun Negur de fiyẽya ado walogouf.
Tamo, ãgenei aiweĩ tar nigin wauĩ laaf fen, idi waud morõ to wenẽdigouf.
Kayau taka ĩ momoiya ado, in ibor bun waab adodiyouf are, ĩ yogo isennẽdiyouf, idi nigin sios morõ to ifenẽf, anĩ bunem, sios waab idi isennẽdiya nigin bagai yenek anidi isennẽdiyouf.
Kurõ fesiya od are yeir. Negur ada mata ibodkeleya ifanadan, age fe di, mata enei are yogo Naal bun ibodok.
Taka ĩ Naal ado, ĩ mata ado, taka ĩ Negur Naal sã, ĩ mata sã.
Anĩ nigin, Naal ĩ kafĩ fiya bun tamal yalelneĩf are, ã momoi bagai karika lauf.
Anĩ nigin, aya ã arokeneik, aya ã nigin darau alef ge fen, to felu gouf, darau are ã fula fiya medeĩya ifeneĩya nigin.
Ere nigin, tamo age fediya are, neda Odug Kristus aruna to daledig, anĩ ere, idi dogo neid oroya aruna daledig. Od dan biya ado mala yaleya nẽ od bunem, idi tamo kisi sã gen anidi didegnẽdidig.
Idi tobonunã madur fiya sã fire fire ganan, sane, safina nigin neu dogol yeya ado, to ile oroya anim isokosen. Idi kiyeĩ, tamo yukesiya, kusĩ, idegẽya ado, sanem barikã. Idi dumen od wogõ dedig,
Awa Uur Fateul ada namedan ibodok anĩ nẽ megeir bunem, ereb ereb biya ifonon anĩ kulatun wo.
Taka ĩ yogo bouwa nẽ oroya dõ fiya nigin itenek, ĩ bouwa nẽ oroya bunem daũ fiya yalouf. Taka ĩ Awa Uur dõ fiya nigin itenek, ĩ Awa Uur bunem mata ibodkeleya anĩ yalouf.
Ada idi tunĩ age difen gen, Odug kisi fiya bun to tanenẽf. Idi age difen, gogourum didenkesin.
Ĩ tobonunã sane sã, ĩ yogo nigin aya dogol to yedig, ĩ kaisã to seye yedig, ĩ sane difiyek anĩ to karĩ yeledig.
Nedi siot kapa are ain nẽ siot kapa gen, agef fen, idi neid wayeid furũya are hos musei ado karis kusĩ bun gududu de fen, gou redig gen.
Aya to asi fen, arokenẽdim are, idi mosor sam. Anĩ ere, idi neid mosor nigin to galã dũf.
Ereb tamo kayau serẽ temeleid bun ago gou fenẽ, kisi biya ado ago gouf. Sain biya ã nigin wõ youf ganan to sekil gouf.
Ada keleĩ, mosor nẽ bouwada yukesiyouf nigin, neda oroya tubu ĩ geid aa tetek bun yun, are ada mosor nẽ ferfer to tabodõf nigin age fen,

Ada ai anĩ Negur nẽ gere tar ado, ai anĩ Satan nẽ gere tar anĩ, naig tafe keleĩ youf, are eig fiya. Aib taka ĩ ereb madur to age fef, ĩ Negur nẽ kesu sã, aib taka ĩ yogon tura nigin to wau laa fef, ĩg Negur nẽ kesu sã.
ere nigin, kisi mosor nẽ bouwa bun inodig, are Negur kiwai ifenẽdig, are Negur nẽ lo farumen to ibodõdig, ĩ age fiya nigineg kisi feleya sã.
Anĩ nigin, neu wau seref fen, sigorou seli abidig, aya, ereb Negur aya bun biya age fouf anĩ tari afedig,
Sã, anĩ ere, haiden neid sesewi fiya anĩ kaa sesen bun difenẽdidig, are Negur bun sã. Are aya ã kaa sesen geid bagu gouf nigin to orouf.
Antiok sios bun, profet ado tise difaren, are Banabas, Simeon yana taka Karos dedig, Lusius Sairini taun tamal, Manain (ĩ king Herod ado bibiyedin) ado, Sol.
To lo ge di, taka nem od egem idegneĩf, ere nigin, age fediya bunem Negur nẽ didi, idi nokũ difef anidi bun isidig.
Idi sigoreid ufofãf, ere nigin, idi idegẽya bunem safina yaleya nigin to ifelnẽya nẽ anĩ difelneĩd fen, fõ fõ adok daũ difedif.
Jesus ĩ aibem kiwai ifenẽf anĩ keleĩ, anĩ nigin, ganan filiya sã yen.
“Aya momoi bagai arokeneik, tamo taka ĩ, sipsip nẽ kauwor bobog bunem to ilauf, anĩ ere, naab taka bunem gar ye isilauf are, ĩ bẽ tamo, bẽ yaledig.
Idi naab madur anĩ ditor ken, Beor naal, Balam ĩ sane nẽ mala solo nigin wau laa fedig anĩ nẽ naab dõ difouf nigin fasis difen.
Age de fen, Juda tamo ado haiden, dogo neid uyu irouya geid, aposel to biya difiyeĩd fen, meein tulu difiyẽdiyouf nigin age difen.

Jesus Pita iroken towo fe fen, iron, “Simon Jon naal, õ aya nigin waũ laa fef de?” Pita wau moron, ere nigin, Jesus ĩ to fiyẽ towo fen, “Õ aya nigin waũ laa fef de?” Pita iron, “Odug, ereb ereb ganan õ keleĩ, õ keleĩ, aya õ nigin wau laa fef.” Jesus iron, “Neu sipsip ufoutneĩd.

Ereb taka amuyẽ ado an namen to ilauf, agef fen, aib taka mama nẽ tobonunã age fedig be, idegẽdig, ĩg an to ilauf, anĩ ere, idi yeneid Sipsip Naal nẽ mata ibodõya nẽ buk bun itoton anidi dogol dilauf.

Kayau ĩ, kolos giriya tu releya medeĩya ado giriya bagai ifoun ken, gol, meein meli bagai ado, maaĩ tuwa meli bagai pel naki yen. Ĩ gol kap, ninir safineid ado yogon seseirã tobonunã nẽ sisik isokosen anĩ imam iroun.
Agog fen, enei ganan teten, wauĩ laa fiya ufonũgouf, anim ereb ereb ganan tekelei guf irouwauf.
Jesus idi irokenẽdin, “Negur Tamo Naal fula fiya medeĩya ifenẽf nigin, sain anĩ mogo yeir isil.
Õ to seseirã unoi wodig, õ seseirã unodig de? Õ idegẽya waitou anĩ to bagai oroyõdig, õ dogo neid tempel bun bẽ waledig de?
Anĩ ere, ĩtãfiya anim mosor modoũ ifenẽ di, aya nameun mosorem taka nẽ safina ile oroya fire fire ganan inodin. Ere nigin, lo sãf are, mosor are laa fen.
Aya Israel tamo kayau bun ado haiden buneg asennõf. Aya idi bun õ sur ayok,

Adag kulu kisi neneya adon, tadodon, didegnadan, tenebur nẽ oroya fire fire ado bouwa nẽ oroya fire fire nẽ ferfer tabodon. Ada tobonunã sesen ado kiyeĩ bun tabodon, to dileda orodin, adag taileid to orodan.
Negur, Kristus Jesus ado, engel igirnẽdin meleid bun, aya õ totol bagai orokonok, faded enei dõ fen, taka dogol waũ to wenẽf, õ anĩ kinau ya anĩ bunem ereb taka to agouf.
Anĩ nigin, ãgenei kisi totol anĩ to folõ walagauf, are fau mala solo odug bagai ifeneĩf.
Tamo idi ereb lo difouf nigin imeid bun inon anidi, dogo neid marau sigor dõ difef dile, age difouf anĩ, marau orof.
Pita Jopa an, gaar gabar el fiya tamo yana Simon dedig ĩ ado, naa musei dibodon.
Ã aug are Negur nẽ tempel, Negur nẽ Awa Uur ã namein ibodõdig anĩ, ã to keleĩ de?
Anĩ nigin, turamã tar, ada Jesus nẽ naud bunem, Modoũ Fateul Bagai bun tuninir ya sã ileya nigin kisi feleya.
Jesus baban idi irokenẽdin, “Aya atorneĩ di, ã umirnagauf, agog fen, ã ãgenei mosor bun gare gouf. Aya elef nẽ an, ã isiya kisi feleya sã.”
Anĩ nigin, ã tamo kayau Negurem igirnein, fateul ado Negur nẽ oboi tar nigin, wau yũya, tobonunã biya, wau yukesileya, molol ado, kaisã to seyeya anĩ ufonũgouf.
Taka ĩ aya arunau yalef, ĩ aya dõ fiyauf bagai. Aya abodok nẽ an, neu kabĩ tamo ĩg an ibodõf. Taka ĩ arunau yalef, neu Dei ĩ yana yalesauf.
Ĩ kayau kesu el fe, lo fediyouf bagai. Age fe di, in kesu el de dõ de fen, karĩ difiyẽf.
Anĩ nigin, abob wau tales fen, abob walesagauf, gama ago gef gen.
Od enei ã gariya bunem karĩ gen, are ada abob nigin wauda laa fouf bagai.
Gama enei nẽ morõ odug nigin, aya kisi afef, are tamo ĩ gama ibodok gen, agef ibodõf, are deuf.
Farisia tamo taka, yana Nikodemus ibodon, ĩ Juda uyu irouya neid kaunsel taka.
Age fiya bagai, Rahab naab kayau ĩg, kofo fiya tamo gei feid fen, naab taka bunem sur fedin anĩ bunem, Negur Rahab nigin to madur bagai fiyen de?
Anĩ ere, kayau idi toku tobonunã biya bun momoi douf, waud laa fouf, fateul dibodõf are, idi kesu gõ fiya bun isennẽya dalouf.
Israel tamo kayau neid Negur, tubumã tar igirneĩd fen, idi Isip dibodon sain, Negurem age fe di, idi fulus difen. Negur ĩ megeir odug nem, idi Isip tamal gurif irou ilen.
Negur ĩ, tamo nẽ wau keleĩ, ĩ Awa Uur Fateul, ada ifanadan gen, haiden idig ifenẽdin anĩ bunem, idig yaledin anĩ ifelnẽdin.
Aib ĩ iron, “Õ seseirã to uno,” ĩ eig yeg iron, “Õ taka to ukeis.” Õ seseirã to unof, anĩ ere, taka ukesiyouf are, õ lo wal fiya tamo wõ wouf.
Aya idi mata faimud ibodkeleya afenẽdidig, age afe di, idi to bagai inanakalauf. Takam idi imaun tamal to sosoin fiyauf.
Wau inosiya nẽ Negur, mogo melsã Satan ã yeĩ farumen orok fouf. Neda Odug Jesus nẽ wau ifenẽya ã bun ibodõf.
bouwedim dogol Negur nẽ tobonunã dõ dife fen, in megeir wa difouf. Idi age fediya so weid.
age fiya gen, ada fara fiya musei, anĩ ere, Kristus bun, bouwada tekelei, fara fiya mugu mugu tunĩ ganan geid bagu fedif.
Od enei momoi bagai, anĩ nigin, aya, õ enei totol wogõ wo di, Negur nigin momoi def anidi karĩ del fen, ereb biya anĩ el de age difouf anĩ orouf. Enei ganan are biya bagai, tamo ganan nigin deuf.
Anĩ bunem, Negur nẽ Itotoya eig ye irok anĩ kisi felen, “Abraham Negur nigin momoi yen, age fe di, Negur Abraham madur bagai yen,” age ye fen, Negur Abraham nigin neu mou yen.
Turau tar, ã, neda fula fiya medeĩya nẽ Odug Jesus Kristus nigin momoi gef nigin, ã wauĩ wenẽgef anĩ dogol to lo walagauf.
“Idi neid uleidbanĩ, laa nẽ meku awa dede fiya sã gen; idi neid baleid idegẽya wogõ dedig.” “Gogour sane nẽ mũ sigoredin ibodok.”
Age fiya bagai, tamo dogo bouweid nigin waud laa fedig gen, aiweid tar nigin agef waud laa fouf. Aib ĩ aiwa nigin wau laa fef, are yogo nigin wau laa fef.
Anĩ nigin, ada ere tauf? Haiden idi madur bagai anĩ to dimiren anidi, momoiya bunem madur bagai anĩ dalen.

Jesus solof irokenen, “Aya ereb kũ fenẽya arom are, õ ereb kũ fenẽya anĩ urõf. Anĩ ere, aya momoi arom are, ere nigin õ walau fã wol?”

Kabĩ turau bagai, aya õ arokonok, kayau eneidi biya od nigin aya isennaya nigin kabĩ totol daledig anidi usenneĩd fen, Klemen ado neu kabĩ turau tar ganan, dogo neid yeneid mata ibodõya nẽ buk bun ifaref anidig, usennẽdiyouf.
Idi ogon tamo kayau ado ogon profet didenkeis fen, dogo neid naud fi difelen, anĩ nigin, õ idi naud yõya nigin wenẽdin, are idi yõya kisin bagai wenẽdin.”
Sã bagai! Ada mosor bun gare taun; naig fe di, ada anĩ bun tau tabodõf?
Gaar kuĩ kulu ibodon, gama ibodõya sã, are ĩ namba eit king, ĩ sewen anidi nẽ taka, ĩ yogo daũ fiya bun ilauf.
Anĩ ere, Negur nẽ Itotoya ere yef? “Ferfer kayau ado yogon kesu uru uraileid, ere nigin, ferfer kayau nẽ kesu ĩ, kafĩ fiya sã kayau nẽ kesu akor anĩ to foi fenẽf.”
Tamo kayau safineid ado ibodõya kisi difef anidi, kisi fiya bun, kor bun ado, neneya kisi ado waila dĩ fiya kisi musei bun kuku def, kisi anim tamo daũf sane lauf.
Karat ten õ ulen ado gaar kuĩ, idi kayau bouwa na sur fedig anĩ to orodiyouf. Idi ĩ daũ difiye ken, gemũ dinenẽf. Idi ĩ bouwa dokon, yã nem tõ difiyẽf.
Anĩ ere, tamo ĩ Negur nigin wau laa fef are, Negur ĩ nigin keleĩ.
Amã ere mauf? Juda amã haiden wal fediya de? Gai sã bagai! Amã mogo, Juda ado haiden geid ganan mosor farumen kilei kilei dibodok ya anĩ, moron.
Sain anĩ bun, idi idegẽya waitou bulmakau lubu dinon. Idi anĩ bun sesewi dife fen, idi imedim dinon anĩ nigin seli dabiyou fenẽ, tar odug dinon.

Tamo kayau tunĩ ganan, sane eneidim to didenkesin anidi, idi imedim dinon anĩ to ditor ken, waud to falei yen. Idi kaa sesen yeneid yaleseya to ditor ken, gol, silwa, bras, meein ado, aa nẽ idegẽya waitou, are lo fiya, karĩya be, iyõya kisi felya sã anidi yeneid yaleseya itorõya sã.
Amã Odug anini fiyẽya anĩ keleĩ nigin, amã tamo waud yaleya nigin age mafedig. Amã naig fiya anĩ Negur keleĩ bagai, age fiya gen, amã nigineg ãgenei kisi es fiya bun yaorouf nigin, aya wau irok.

Idi atun ada gananeg, uruwa bun bouwada nẽ oroya anĩ dõ tafe fen, yogon oroya ado kisi dõ tafen. Ada, tamo tunĩ ganan idi gogũ difedin gen, adag age de gogũ difadan bunem, Negur nẽ didi farumen tabodon.
Age ye fen, Pita od musei bun, idi wedereid irou fen, totol irokenẽdin, “Ã aug isenneĩf nigin, tamo kayau sane sain enei bun tamal urab uraileg.”
Ã bouwa nẽ oroya bun ubodõgouf are, ã gare gouf, anĩ ere, Awa Uur bunem ã bouwa nẽ tobonunã anĩ ukesigouf are, ã mata ubodõgouf,
Are Negur nẽ Itotoya bun ibodok kilei, “Taka ĩ, ĩ nigin momoi youf, ĩ mama to bagai yalouf.”
Uruwa bagai, aya ã ganan nigin, Jesus Kristus bunem, neu Negur de afiyek, ere nigin, ãgenei momoiya nigin teneub ganan bun od iyokelen.
Turamã tar, Negur ã nigin wau laa fedig anĩ, amã keleĩ, are Negur ĩ ã igirnein,
Anĩ ganan wal fiya, abob nigin fatuk bagai wauĩ laa fouf, ere nigin, wau laa fiya are mosor musei kerub fedidig.
Amã waag bun Itali kantri malauf nigin od difõ di, Pol kalabus tamo tunĩ geid, kusĩ tamo neid orowa taka yana Julius ima bun dinenẽdin, ĩ Sisa nẽ Kusĩ Mala bun tamal taka.

Negur nẽ ferfer, Moses nẽ seg ado, Sipsip Naal nẽ seg dalen: “Odug Negur saa ilun nẽ kusĩ tamo guri weid uyu uroudig anĩ, õ agodig anĩ odug fen, mala yũ yaleya. Teneub ganan nẽ King, ogon naab are madur fen, momoi bagai.
Momou mata gõ fediya gen, uur nẽ sumin karẽtut nigin fatuk bagai oroyeĩf, ago ge di, ã anĩ bunem ãgenei kel yaleya bun odugouf.

Anĩ bure fele di, aya saa ilunem ait taka eig ye mog, karĩ aun, “Utot: Idi sain enei bunem ilauf ganan, Odug bun gare douf are el fediyouf.” Awa Uurem irok, “Momoi, idi dogo neid kabĩ bun si dinouf, ere nigin, idi ereb age difen are ado dilauf.”
Momoiya, Negur ada Tamada karẽtut ado kũ fenẽya sã gen iledig, are eig fiya: maad ado waab, nedi morõ bun kulatun fediya, agef fen, tenebur nẽ oroyam to amuyẽ iroudauf nigin lo feleya.
Aya taka nem meleĩ yaleya od biyai biyai bunem to idegneĩf nigin enei arokeneik.

Agef fen, aya, ereb ereb ganan saa ilun difaref, tenebur difaref, teneub farumen difaref ado, maaĩ bun difaref, ereb ereb ganan anĩ namen mata difaref idi seg dale mog, karĩ aun: “Ĩ king nẽ sia bun ibodok ado Sipsip Naal bun, yana yaleseya, yana odug, fula fiya medeĩya ado, megeir, gai gai ibodkalauf!”
Engel uyu wõ yen anĩ dõ fiya yogon taur wese fe di, ereb arei odug gen yã fitotoleya ado maaĩwõ iran. Maaĩ faraf towo fiya gen anĩ taka, naud falei felen,
Idi taun tamal Stiwen dĩ de dirou dile, serẽ meein tulu difiyen. Age dife mog, Stiwen bou bun od dun idi, nedi kolos dinukaka ken, tamo gaũ yana Sol ĩ ye gariyan gõ difen.
Baban, “Haiden ã ganan, Odug yana waleseg! Tamo kayau ã ganan, ĩ yana waleseg fen, seg waleg!”
Ada keleĩ, od enei are momoi, ere nigin, ereb ereb ganan ĩ bun tamal isif, ereb ereb ganan ĩ bunem ibodok, ereb ereb ganan ĩ bun ilef. Ĩ bun fula fiya medeĩya faimud ibodõf! Momoi.
Naa taka di, Jon, Jesus wagen iyok isi mog, ile fen, iron, “Ulegef, Negur nẽ Sipsip Naal, ĩ tamo ganan neid mosor yaleledif!
Momoiya bunem, naabur kayau Rahab, idi Negur ait to dõ difedig geid to didenkesin, ere nigin, ĩ kofo tamo aan fiyẽdin.
Bẽ tamo are bẽ nigin, yukesiyouf nigin ado, narĩ fouf nigin dogol isif, aya idi mata dale fen, barikãuf nigin asin.
Anĩ ere, ada neda ibodõya modoũ are, saa ilun ibodok. Agef fen, ada kel yaleya tamo Odug Jesus Kristus an tamal fatuk bagai tari tafef.
Anĩ nigin, Negur yana fula fiya medeĩya bun iselauf nigin, Kristus ã yaleyein gen, ãg abob walogouf.

Tamo eneidi geid uleg fen, nonorou lilik fiya nẽ tobonunã bun ulagauf. Agog fen, na walekenẽdiyouf, ago di, idi fatiyeid korerẽ difalauf. Ago ge di, õ nigin od enei are momoi sã, õ ogo Moses nẽ Lo dõ wedig anĩ, tamo kayau ganan keleĩ youf.
Ĩ mulũ ileya nedig temeid, idi mulũ dilen dogol sã, anĩ ere, idi tubuda Abraham ĩ mulũ ileya sã mog, momoiya ado iyon anĩ yebura dõ de diyõdig anidi nedig.
Age de fen, idi aisaĩ dira ken, aisaĩ Matias wagen kubũ yen, anĩ bunem, Matias ĩ aposel ilewen baguf weimen.
“Idi neid kũ fenẽya nigin weder tu keledig, idi neid mosor yaleledig, are el fedif.
Eneidi are oliv aa uru ado lam tutur uru, tenebur nẽ Odug wagen difaref.
Wauĩ gudũf, maruĩ isi fen, inã walogouf. Kasãya utorõg fen, wauĩ gudũ fouf, wauĩ kulĩya utorõg fen, wauĩ morõf.
Turau oboiyou, ereb sane anĩ to madẽ wo, ereb biya anĩ madẽ wouf. Aib taka ereb biya age fef, ĩ Negur bun tamal. Aib taka ereb sane age fef, ĩ Negur to ilen.

Ĩ mulũ ileya nẽ uris, are ĩ fau mulũ ileya sã mog, momoiya bunem Negur madur bagai yen anĩ nẽ uris yalen. Anĩ nigin, ĩ mulũ ileya san momoi def ganan neid temeid, anĩ bunem, Negur idi madur bagai youf.
ere nigin, taka ĩ laa fen are, ĩ mosor nẽ megeir bun tamal yalelnen.
Amã faimud Jesus nẽ laa anĩ, bouwamã bun faali ma mayõdig, are Jesus nẽ matag bouwamã bun yaorouf nigin.
Ere nigin, ganan dogo nigin dogol kisi difedig, Jesus Kristus nẽ biya fiya nigin to kisi difedig.
Abraham ĩ tubau bagai, Sara ĩ yogo dali. Anĩ ere, momoiya bunem, Abraham tama wõya nigin kisi felen, ere nigin, ĩ, Negur age afouf yen anĩ agef wõ youf bagai ye fen, momoi yen.
Aya sur fiyan nẽ oroya are yeir, idi ganan ĩ ifanan taka to folõ afalauf, anĩ ere, aya idikeleya naa bun alesnẽdiyouf.

anĩ ere, ada bun Negur tekelei dogol ibodok, are Dei, ĩ bun tamal ereb ereb ganan wõ yen, ĩ nigin ada mata tabodok. Odug tekelei dogol ibodok, are Jesus Kristus, ĩ bunem ereb ereb ganan wõ yen, ĩ bunem ada mata tabodok.

Anĩ ere, Timoti gama bagai, ã bun tamal amã gein isi fen, ãgenei momoiya ado wauĩ laa fiya nigin od biya irou isin. Ĩ irokanaman, are ã, amã nigin faimud biya karĩ welegedig ado, amã ã ileyeĩya nigin waumã irõdig gen, ãg ilemãya nigin wauĩ irõdig yen.
Agog mog, sipsip lo fiya tamo neid mudur wõ youf sain bun, ã fula fiya medeĩya nẽ teter to bagai tu ralauf anĩ walogouf.
Anĩ nigin, amã waumã iseya age fiya ado nigin, amã wogõya bun tuninirya sã.

Anĩ ere, tamo eneidi, ereb idi keleĩ sã nigin kono difedig. Idi gaar kuĩ kisi sã, bouwa nẽ oroya dogol dõ dife di, tamom kaka difeid fen, didenkesiyouf nigin dogol gõ difedidig anidi gen. Gaar kuĩ gen, idig daũ fediyouf.
Ĩ maleg tamo nigin kisif fen, enei to iron, ĩ yogo bẽ tamo nigin age yen. Ĩ moni nẽ kodol lo fiya tamo, moni nẽ kodol bun dinodig are bẽ yaledig.
Age fiya nigin, ada, wau laa fiya ada nigin Negur ado anĩ kelei ken, momoi taudig. Negur ĩ wau laa fiya. Aib taka wau laa fiya bun ibodok, ĩ Negur bun ibodõ di, Negur ĩ bun ibodok.
Stiwen dukesin sain bun, kafĩ fiya wõ ye di, momoiya tamo kayau firagagaũ dife fen, tunĩ Fonisia distrik, Saipras nuyo ado, Antiok taun dile fen, Juda tamo kayau bun dogol biya od wogõ difiyẽdin.
Anĩ ere, safina nigin wau morõ sã ado fateul ibodõya anĩ, mala biya ado.

Gaar kuĩ ĩ, Negur nẽ tamo kayau geid kusĩ de fen, idi wal fediyouf nigin megeir ifenen. Agef fen, ĩ, ibor ganan, tamo kayau ganan, od fire fire ganan ado, teneub ganan nẽ mudur ibodõf nigin megeir ifenen.

Anĩ ere, ã mosor unogen nigin wagĩ fiya waleg fen, morõ faali gouf are, ã bun ere biya anĩ isiyouf? Anĩ ere, ã ereb biya ago gen nigin darau waleg fen, anĩ faali gouf are, enei are Negur mala bun biya.

Gariya enei nigin, Kristus ĩ bar itenẽya mata nẽ atun tamo, anĩ bunem, tamo Negurem iweignẽdin anidi, faimud ibodkeleya akor, are Negur age afouf yen anĩ dalouf. Ere nigin, bar itenẽya tubu bun, mosor dinon anidi, nedi mosor bun tamal yalelnẽdiyouf nigin, ĩ laa fen.
Age fiyauf are, ada ere tauf? Negur nẽ wau ifenẽya ifagauf nigin, ada mosorei tauf de?
Takag, od sesen, neneya od be, od sane nem weli to unogouf, are ada nigin to biya, anĩ ere, de fiyẽya od wogõ gouf.

Aya lo afen, aya wageun an hos bailuya taka ifaren. Tamo anĩ teten ibodon ĩ yana Laa, age fe di, Hades ĩ degẽ degẽ fiyen. Idi tenebur tamo kayau aiwa adodo foi fiya atun taka anĩ, dimig nem, kadir nem, dagi odug nem ado, tenebur gaar kuĩ nem didenkesiyouf nigin megeir ifenẽdin.

Anĩ nigin, ereb Negur age afouf yen are, wau ifenẽya bunem, kabĩ yalef ya anĩ yaorouf nigin, momoiya bunem isidig, are Negur ĩ, ege luwa Abraham nẽ ibor nẽ tubu tar ganan afenẽdiyouf yen anĩ, megeir fiya nigin age fedig, idi lo dõ difedig anidi bun dogol sã, anĩ ere, idi Abraham nẽ momoiya dõ difedig anidi buneg. Age fiya nigin, Abraham ĩ, ada ganan neda tamada.
Idi aya fele difiyale fen, dalisnau fenẽ age difen, ere nigin, aya laa nẽ mosor taka to anon.
Anĩ nigin, are, tamo nẽ oroya be kabĩ totol yaleya bunem sã, Negur nẽ wau yũya bunem.
Ada idi tunĩ age difen gen, noli tobonunã to tanouf. Age dife di, naa tekelei bun, idi atun tuwenti tri tausen tamo kayau gare den.
anĩ ere, aya lo taka anĩ bouwau tunĩ bun kabĩ yale mog, ailef, are neu kisi biya nẽ lo ado kusĩ de fen, aya, mosor, bouwau tunĩ bun kabĩ yalef anĩ nẽ lo nẽ kalabus tamo inenadig.

Anĩ nigin, ada, ifelnẽya gariya bunem Kristus nigin kelein daũ are tator ken, keleĩ tõya bagai bun talauf. Ada keleĩ eig fediya nigin baban to gariya tanouf, are laa ileya nẽ suma bun tamal faleiya, Negur nigin momoiya,
Anĩ nigin, taka nem ĩ yaleya nigin to itorõf. Yogon delẽ bun wau inosiya ado sur wiyẽge di, ĩ aya gein kel isiyouf. Ĩ tura tar geid disiyouf nigin, aya ololo afedif.
Turau tar, tamo taka aya momoi auf ye fen, to dõf age fouf, ĩ ere biya age fouf? Momoiya age fiyam tau isennẽf?
Sain anĩ bun, Jerusalem tamo kayau tunĩ diron, “Tamo enei are idi ĩ dukesiyouf nigin age difef anĩ sã de?
Age ye fen, idi bun fuu fiyeĩd fen, iron, “Awa Uur Fateul waleg.

Ere nigin, idi madur bagai Negur bunem isif anĩ to kelei ken, dogo neid madur bagai anĩ dalouf nigin dimiren, age dife fen, idi, Negur tamo kayau yogon mala bun madur bagai inenẽdiya nẽ naab anĩ ditoron.

Aib taka Negur Naal nigin momoi yef, ĩ kurõ fesiya od enei in wau bun ibodok. Aib taka Negur nigin to momoi yef, ĩ Negur idegẽya tamo yef, ere nigin, ĩ Negur yogon Naal nigin od kurõ fesin anĩ to momoi yef.
Aya ã momoi bagai arokeneik, taka ĩ aya nigin momoi yef, ereb aya age afedig, ĩg age fouf, enei age afedig anĩ wal fiyag age fouf, ere nigin, aya Dei gein eselef.
Ferfer, ereb ereb ganan bun, nedi moroid tar karĩ difediyouf, waud al fiya difenẽdiyouf, aiteid to solo difouf,
Taka nem Negur nẽ wau ifenẽya to folo rouf nigin ado, aa faat dirikeĩ gen to wõ ye fen, musei morõ ifeneĩd fen, amuyẽ ifenẽdiyouf nigin lo welegei.
Ĩ serẽ temeleid buneg yana biya adouf bagai, anĩ bunem, ĩ yana sane to yale fen, Satan nẽ kor bun to ilauf.
Anĩ ere, ada mugu mugu wau ifenẽya, Kristus ege luwa ifenẽya nigin kisi fen kilei, ifanadan.
Anĩ dõ fiya engel taka, yogon beĩ maaĩ bun fi fele di, maaĩ anĩ laa tamo nẽ naud gen falei fen, age fe di, ereb ereb maaĩwõ mata dibodon ganan gare den.

kisi karẽtut walogouf, ago ge di, idi Kristus bun ãgenei tobonuneĩ biya nigin od sane wogõ def anidi, dogo neid dumen od wogõya nigin mama fediyouf.
Neu Dei nẽ oroya anĩ, taka ĩ Naal ile fen, ĩ nigin momoi yef, mata faimud ibodkeleya yalouf, idikeleya naa bun aya alesnẽf.”
Kaisã bagai, Odug nẽ engel Herod yũ iran, ere nigin, ĩ Negur yana to yalesen. Ĩ mamatem dõ di, laa fen.
Negur, neda Odug Jesus Kristus Tama, wau yũya nẽ Tama, wau yo fiya ganan nẽ Negur yana talesauf,
Tunĩ enei bunem diya dile, od kaũ sã wogõya bun dilelen.
Aya biya od nigin to mama fiyaf, ere nigin, are Negur nẽ megeir, tamo ganan momoi def, kel gei fouf nigin, Juda idi bun keteme di, Juda sã anidi idi buneg age fouf.
Ere nigin, fõ gariya inon, are Jesus Kristus, taka nem fõ gariya fire inoya kisi feleya sã.
Anĩ ere, ã aug nigin wauĩ laa fedig gen, ã mugu mugu ãgenei kayau tar nigineg agog wauĩ laa fouf. Age fe di, kayau ĩ yogon tamo farumen ibodõf.
Sain ã, ãgenei mosor nigin ado ãgenei mosor nẽ oroya nigin mulũ ileya sã nigin, laa bun ufareg mog, Negur ĩ, ã Kristus geid kel turĩ yein. Ĩ neda mosor adok nigin weder tu kelen.
Uyu irouya imeid õ teten dino fen, profet od bunem uur nẽ ege luwa walen anĩ to welebi wo.
Anĩ bure fele di, aya, saa mata ado teneub mata, ailen. Saa uyulil ado teneub uyulil are waĩf yalen, agef fen, maaĩ baban to ibodon.
Wauĩ bun faimud kulĩ youf,
Naa anidi bun tamo laa dimirẽf, anĩ ere, to dilouf. Idi laa orodiyouf, anĩ ere, laa to gurug fediyouf.
Jesus laaf fen, kel fã yen nigin ada momoi tauf, anĩ nigin, Negur, idi Jesus bun gare den anidi, Jesus geid guri feid isiyouf nigin momoi tauf.
Aib taka Jesus ĩ Negur Naal youf are, Negur ĩ bun ibodok, age fe di, ĩ Negur bun ibodok.

Bobog are aya, taka ĩ aya bunem isiyouf are, mata kel yalouf. Ĩ namen isi fen, ulõ yeis ilauf, agef fen, fisir yõya nẽ fotou fouf.
Idi meein tulu difedin. Idi so nem kokour difedi di, uru wõ yen. Idi dimig nem didenkesin. Idi sipsip gabar ado meme gabar difounkel dilen, are idi maleg dibodon, darau dalen, to biya difiyẽdin.

Are Odug eig ye irokanaman: “ ‘Aya õ haiden neid lalan anenon, anĩ bunem, teneub idikelediya bun, tamo kayau usenneĩd, kel gei wediyouf.’ ”

Anĩ ere, amã inokõya ado mama nẽ naab matoron, amã to madeg ken, Negur nẽ od to falei mafeledig. Anĩ ere, amã momoi nẽ anĩ yaor mafe fen, Negur mala bun, tamo ganan dogo neid kisi es fiya bun, amã mug nigin yanamã iseledig.
Negur ĩ ima biyalem yalesnẽ di, Jesus ĩ, Tama bun Awa Uur Fateul Negur afeneĩf yen anĩ yale fen, fi felen, are ã gama ulegef ado karĩ gef anĩ.
oroya mata ufonũgen, are Negur nẽ malakanon nigin keleĩ bun mata falei yeĩdig.
Jesus ĩ enei karĩ ye fen, iron, “Dagi eneim to laa ilauf, are Negur nẽ fula fiya medeĩya nigin, anĩ bunem, Negur Naal yana dalesauf.”

Ere nigin, biya od bun, Negur ĩ tamo kayau yogon mala bun madur bagai inenẽdiya nẽ naab anĩ kurõ fesif, Negur ĩ tamo kayau yogon mala bun madur bagai inenẽdiya nẽ naab anĩ momoiya bunem dogol isif, are Negur nẽ Itotoya bun ibodok kilei, “Madur tamo momoiya bunem mata ibodõf.”
Ĩ yogon aa tetek faali fe, modoũ Mudur Tuwan (Hibru od nem Golgota dedig) iselen.
Negur wau ifenẽya ada ifanadan kilei, ada Negur nẽ igirĩya ege luwa fire fire ado. Tamo ĩ profet od wogõya nẽ igirĩya ege luwa adouf, utornẽg len, ĩ yogon momoiya kilei wogõ youf.
Ereb mata ibodõya uyu ifaren are laion gen, anĩ dõ fiya are bulmakau gen, anĩ dõ fiya are nawa, tamo nawa gen, anĩ dõ fiya are webi fatutu yef gen.
Anĩ nigin, ãgenei ibodõya nigin el ge lo walagauf. Kisi sã gen to ufaragauf, anĩ ere, kisi biya ado gen ufaragauf.
Juda ado haiden bun fire fire sã, Odug de tekelei anĩ ganan nẽ Odug, ĩ idi diweignek ganan bun el fiya fatuk bagai ifenẽdidig,
Kristus ĩ, idi momoi def ganan madur bagai wowã douf nigin, lo nẽ idikeleya wõ yen.
Ã ereb taka nigin to suwẽ gouf, anĩ ere, ereb ereb ganan bun, kosẽya ado to fiya bunem, Negur de wiyẽg fen, ãgenei to fiya Negur bun unogouf.
Enei ganan ada wederada irouya nigin wõ yen, anĩ bunem ada idi age difen gen, ereb sane nigin wauda to tanouf.
Ĩ ku isil idĩya sã anĩ kã fele di, kaau are yã odug kũ fiya modoũ bun tamal gen fã yen. Ku isil idĩya sã bun tamal kaau anim, gaa ado saa gugum kelen.
Enei bun, takam ne tura sane to age fiyẽf, idegẽya bunem morõ to ifenẽf. Amã mogo marokenei ken, wedereĩ maroun, are Odug fau mosor age fediya ganan nigin tamo mala solo ifenẽdiyouf.
Anĩ nigin, taka ĩ Kristus bun ibodok, Negur ĩ yale, mata bagai inon. Tubu are ilele di, mata anĩ isin.

Menig nigin, ferfer, tempel lo fiya tamo geid, yã kũ de fen, salili de, bouweid diroron. Pita ĩg weim difar fen, bouwa iroron.

Pita to fen, “Odug, ere nigin gama aya õ dõ yõya kisi feleya sã? Aya õ nigin neu mata atorõf.”
Ago ge di, Negur nẽ wau inosiya tamo nẽ karĩya ganan wal fiya anim, Kristus Jesus bun, ãgenei wauĩ ado ãgenei kisi kulatun fediyouf.
Baledam ada neda Odug ado Tamada yana talesedig, age tafe fen, de anim tamo Negur yogo gen inodin anĩ gelu tafedidig.

anĩ ere, aya teneub enei nẽ tamo kayau geid to nigal gouf nigin to orok, are idi noli tobonunã, ereb ereb nigin akorouya, idegẽya bunem taka nẽ safina bẽ yaleya be, idegẽya waitou yana yaleseya age difedig. Ã idi geid to nigal gouf are, ã teneub enei utorõgouf.
“Aya yugeg, Jesus Nasaret tamal yana kiwai afenẽf nigin ereb ereb ganan age afouf aun.

Idi meleid bun seseirã tobonunã barikã ado fen, mosor inoya nigin to bagai ditorõdig. Idi, tamo kayau totol sã difaref anidi, didĩ difedidig. Idi safina musei youf nigin imeid su lai de fen sũ we fiya nigin keleĩ bagai. Idi daũ feidleya nẽ gere tar.
Oroi tamo are ĩ sipsip marau sã. Anĩ nigin, ĩ gaũ kuĩ isi di, ile fen, sipsip itorarã iyadig. Age fe di, gaũ kuĩ sipsip kaka feid fen, firagagaũ fedidig.
Turau tar oboiyou, enei karĩ walagauf: Tamo ganan kaisã bagai karĩ gouf, kaisã to wogõ gouf, kaisã to seye gouf,
Naab tekelei anĩ bun, Odug iron, are idi biya od wogõ def anidi, biya od bunem mata ibodõya nẽ safina dalouf.
Aya lalan anĩ, tenebur ein asin, are taka ĩ aya nigin momoi yef, ĩ gugum bun to ibodõf nigin age afen.
Dum Jesus tamo anĩ tempel bun fotou fiye ken, irokenen, “Ulef, õ baban biya lel. Baban mosor to uno, are ereb sane bagai uruwa nẽ wal fiya anĩ, õ bun to wõ youf nigin.”
Ereb ereb ganan wau laa fiya bun ago gouf.

Lo welegei, are ĩ wogõ yef anĩ to dudum wog. Idi tenebur ein wedereid iroun ĩ dudum difiyen idi to diyalelen, ani nigin, ada saa ilunem wederada irouf ĩ dudum tafouf are, ada iyaleleya nigin malai bagai.
Uruwa bun, ã Negur keleĩ sa ken, ã idi waitou bagai sã anĩ farumen ferfer ubodõgen.
Negur yogon kabĩ tamo yalesne ken, ãgenei sane bun tamal, ã mugu mugu ganan falei ge di, el yeĩf nigin, ã bun ket Jesus sur fen.”
“Amã, Jerusalem ado Juda neid teneub bun, ereb Jesus age fen anĩ ganan malamã mailen. Idi ĩ aa tetek bun dũ di, laa fen.
Turau tar, aya neda Odug Jesus Kristus yana bunem totol bagai arokeneik, are ã atun fara fiya taka to ibodõf nigin, ã ganan abob nigin wauĩ tekelei yen ken, ã wauĩ ado kisi tekelei bagai ubodõgouf.
Uruwa bun, ã Negur nigin gerõ ufareg fen, ãgenei tobonunã sane bunem, ãgenei kisi bun Negur nigin kiwai ubodõgen.
Oosi nẽ bouwa oroya sane so wiyẽ, ago fen, madur bagai ibodõya, momoiya, wau laa fiya ado, wau inosiya anĩ, aib idi waud karẽtut bun Odug diweignek anidi geid, dõg.
Age fiya nigin, ã mogo Kristus geid keg fã gen nigin, ãgenei wauĩ ereb ereb ilun nẽ nigin, Kristus Negur ima biyalẽ ibodok nẽ an, unogouf.

Engel uyulil yogon taur wese fe di, uyẽ ais, yã naud ado bagu fen, isi di, tenebur iraran, age fe di, teneub tekelei faraf towo fiya gen anĩ taka adok isaikelen, aa ganan faraf towo fiya gen anĩ taka adok isaikelen, agef fen, fisir mata ganan isasaikelen.
diron: “Odug Negur saa ilun nẽ kusĩ tamo guri weid uyu uroudig anĩ, õ gama ubodok, kulu ubodon, amã õ de mayok, ere nigin, õ ogon megeir odug wale fen, lo fiya nigin king wõ won.

Kristus ĩ ãgenei mata, ĩ wõ youf sain bun, ãg ĩ geid fula fiya medeĩya bun wõ gouf.
Anĩ ere, Jesus ĩ Kristus, Negur Naal anĩ ã momoi ge fen, ĩ yana nigin momoiya bunem, ã mata walogouf nigin enei itoton.

Ada Negur bun temelada, age tafe di, aib ĩ Negur keleĩ, ada karĩ fadadig, anĩ ere, aib ĩ Negur bun tamal sã, ada to karĩ fadadig. Anĩ bunem, ada momoi bagai nẽ Awa Uur ado kũ fenẽya nẽ uur nigin keleĩ youf.

Tamo enidi, ãgenei wauĩ laa fiya nẽ sifa bun, ã geid kumĩ sã saaf dokon maaĩwõ sa tuwa waag daũ fiyẽdig gen, daũ diyeĩdig. Idi sipsip lo fiya tamo, dogo naumeid nigin dogol kisi difedig gen. Taka nem noli tobonunã to inouf nigin be, Esau gen Negur nigin kisi sã to ibodõf nigin lo welegei. Esau ĩ, kesu matu nigin yogon akor fau yalouf anĩ, sain tekelei nẽ saaf anĩ nem na sur fen.

ne tã kiwai ifenẽya, sibuya, kisim aya aya yeya, Negur nigin wau laa fiya ban bouwa nẽ oroya nigin wau laa fiya,

Amã, neda Odug Jesus Kristus nẽ megeir ado isiya nigin ã marokenein sain are, amã nemã kisim tamo nẽ nenerĩ anĩ to wogõ mayein, anĩ ere, amã malamam bagai yogon fula fiya medeĩya nẽ megeir mailen anĩ wogõ maun.

Ĩ yogon pas ganan bun, eig fe itotoid fen, enei nigin wogõ yen. Yogon pas bun, ereb ereb tunĩ keleĩya nigin lakĩ fiya bagai ibodok, are idi keleĩ sa ken, momoiya ilef isif anidi, Negur nẽ Itotoya tunĩ bun age difedig gen, falei difeid fen, dogo daũ feidleya bun diledig.

Aibem taka ĩ aya momoi auf ye fen, ereb ereb lo irok kilei bagai dõf age fouf, anĩ ere, yogon sigor to fateul inouf are, ĩ yogo idegne ken, yogon momoiya are kaũ sã.
Aya od arokenein anĩ, ã karĩ walagauf, ‘Ferfer taka yogon odug to wal fedig.’ Idi aya darau difanan are, ãg age de darau difeneĩf. Idi neu od dõ difen are, idi ãgeneig age de dõ difouf.
Jesus, Juda tamo ĩ momoi difiyen anidi irokenẽdin, “Aya afelnein anĩ uroug tokõ walagauf are, ã momoi bagai neu dõ fiya tar.
“Age fe di, Isip teneub ado Kanan teneub ganan bun, naũ odug wõ ye di, morõ odug dalen, age fe di, tubuda tar saaf fotou fiya kisi feleya san.
Aya ogon gere tar tunĩ, Dei ada irokanadan kilei, momoi bun diyõ mog, ail fen, fatuk bagai wau al fen.
Taka ĩ yogon ibor tar to kulatun fediyouf, yogon sina tama kayau kesu bagai anĩ to kulatun fediyouf are, in wau momoiya wa fef, anĩ bunem, ĩ sane bagai, taka to momoi yef anĩ wal fiya.
Anĩ nigin, ada wauda tutuk fen, momoiya totol ado Negur non talauf, ere nigin, ada wauda, mosor nẽ wau morõ bun tamal wirif kulo fada le fen, bouwada naan karẽtut nem kulo felen.
Idi od enei dogol karĩ den: “Tamo ĩ kulu ada darau ifanadan, ĩ momoiya daũ fouf nigin kulu age fen anĩ, gama wogõ yef.”

Õ totol ufar fen, neu yanau nigin morõ faali won, anĩ ere, õ to fõ yon.

Tamo biyeid dogo nigin biya kulatun difouf nigin, idi anĩ karĩ difiyẽdiyouf nigin, idi kisi biya ado dibodõf nigin ado, momoiya, waud laa fiya ado, feseya sã ifareya bun madur dibodõf nigin ufelnẽdiyouf bagai.
Tamo kayau Negur nigin to kelein sain, idi to kelei ken, age difedig anĩ, Negur to eweid yon, anĩ ere, gama ĩ, tamo kayau adok teneub ganan bun waud falei youf nigin irokenẽdif.
Jesus nẽ aa tetek sirin, Jesus sina, sina nẽ tura, Maria Kolopas aiwa, Maria Magdala tamal an difaren.
Ĩ kolos meluk naud bun nu fen anĩ ifonun. Yogon yana are, Negur nẽ Od.
Anĩ ere, ereb ã karika ago gouf anim, idi momoiya totol sã anidi bun, naabura gudũ fiya to wenẽdigouf nigin lo walagauf.
Negur ĩ laa bun tamal kel turĩ fiyẽ di, ĩ to bagai bura lauf nigin, Negur eig ye iron: “ ‘Aya momoi bagai nẽ ado fateul nẽ el fiya, are aya Dawid afenẽf aun anĩ, ã afeneĩf.’
Naa anĩ bun, aya neu Dei bun abodok, ã aya bun ubodõgef, aya ã bun abodok anĩ, ã keleĩ youf.
Ada keleĩ, ada yogon ĩtãfiya dõ tafef are, ada mogo ĩ keleĩ.
Anĩ nigin, aya, ã ãgenei mosor bun gare gouf ayein. Aya yug nigin, aya im audig anĩ, to momoi gouf are, ã momoi bagai ãgenei mosor bun gare gouf.”
Aya, kayau, Negur nẽ tamo kayau neid naudeid ado, idi Jesus nẽ od kurõ difesin anidi, nedi naudeid yokon, mala waĩ ye mog, ailen. Aya kayau anĩ ail fen, fatuk bagai terẽ aun.
Anĩ dumen, ã karĩ gef kilei, ĩ el fiya enei akorouf nigin oron, anĩ ere, ĩ to yalen. Ĩ inã ado el fiya anĩ imiren, anĩ ere, ĩ wau faleiya nigin naab taka san.
Tamo kayau atun, ĩ nigin fatuk bagai kosesẽ kurã den. Tunĩ diron, “Ĩ tamo biya.” Tunĩ solo de diron, “Eo, ĩ tamo kayau idegnẽdidig.”
Odug nẽ megeir idi adon, age fe di, tamo kayau musei momoi de fen, Odug bun falei den.

Age fiya ban, Negur biya od wogõya nigin igirneĩd fen, yo fiyẽdin anidim gen, amã wogõ maudig. Amã tamo waud al fouf nigin to kabĩ malef, anĩ ere, Negur ĩ wauda es fedig, ĩ wau al fouf nigin kabĩ malef.

Kayau waab bagai taka, ĩ mugu bagai, isennẽya yaleya nigin yogon wau iseya Negur bun ino fen, bõ ado gaa ado toku kosẽ ye fen, Negur bun isennẽya yaleya nigin to fiyẽf.
Uruwa bunem isi gama, aya yanau nem, ereb taka nigin to, to gen. To gouf, walogouf, ago gouf, ã kulĩya barikãf.
Sain Negur ĩ iweignon, õ ferfer ubodon de? Õ anĩ nigin to morõ yõf, anĩ ere, õ ferfer itorõya nigin kisi falauf are, anĩ õ agouf.
Tamo eneidim ã fara diyeĩf, idi tenebur nẽ kisi dõ de fen, Awa Uur idi bun to ibodok.
Aya, ã kaisã bagai Negur ĩ Kristus nẽ wau ifenẽya bunem ã iweignein anĩ utornẽg fen, biya od fire bun falei ge di, terẽ auf.
Tamo ganan geid wauĩ inosiya bun ubodõg fen, fateulouf nigin kabĩ totol waleg. Fateul sãf are, takam Odug to ilouf.
Ĩ irokenẽdin, “Waag siri biya melem kakãg urãg fen, tunĩ gei gouf.” Idi age difen sain, idi kakãg dĩ fiya kisi feleya san, ere nigin, gau musei biya.
Mulũ ileya are ege, mulũ ileya sã areg ege. Anĩ ere, Negur nẽ ĩtãfiya dõ fiya anĩ odug bagai.

Ĩ wau yaleseya nẽ igirĩya ege luwa adouf, utornẽg len, ĩ taka nẽ wau yalesauf. Ĩ tunĩ lau fiya isennẽya nẽ igirĩya ege luwa adouf, utornẽg len, ĩ wau sã ifenẽdiyouf. Ĩ uyu irouya nẽ igirĩya ege luwa adouf, utornẽg len, ĩ fõ fiya sã uyu irouya kabĩ yalouf. Ĩ wau yũya ifelnẽya nẽ igirĩya ege luwa adouf, utornẽg len, ĩ wau kulĩya ado age fouf.
to fiyẽdin, “Ã momoi ge fen, Awa Uur Fateul walegen de?” Idi ĩ dirokenen, “Sã, amã Awa Uur Fateul ibodok ya anĩg to karĩ maun.”
Taka ĩ pas enei bun marokeneik anĩ to dõ fouf are, dẽ wiyẽ kalagauf. Ĩ mama fouf nigin, weim to nigal ũgouf.
Turau tar, aya ã arokeneik, are tenebur nẽ bouwam Negur nẽ tano to akorou youf. Ereb bura ledig anĩg to bura lauf anĩ to akorou youf.

Saaf sane ledig anĩ nigin to kabĩ waleg, anĩ ere, saaf to sane le fen, mata faimud ibodkeleya bun ibodõdig anĩ nigin kabĩ waleg, are Tamo Naalem ifeneĩf. Ĩ dogol Tama Negurem igirne ken, yoya nẽ megeir ganan ifenen.”
Sain ã to gef bun, to walegedig, ere nigin, ã wauĩ bun tutuk sa ken, to gedig, ã ereb walegef are aug naumeĩ nigin ge fen, iraileya nigin ago gedig.
Sain ganan bun, Negur Tamada ereb ereb ganan nigin, neda Odug Jesus Kristus yana bun de wiyẽgouf.
Abraham bun kisi gouf: “Ĩ Negur nigin momoi yen, age fe di, Negurem ĩ madur bagai fiyen.”
Taun are, gaa lalan be, ogõ lalan yaleya nigin to yenek, ere nigin, Negur nẽ fula fiya medeĩya anim lalan ifenẽdig, agef fen, Sipsip Naal are taun nẽ lam.
Anĩ ere, Negur nẽ Awa Uur ã namein ibodõf are, ã mosor nẽ bouwam to ulum iroukeneĩf, anĩ ere, ã Awa Uurem ulum iroukeneĩf. Anĩ ere, taka ĩ Kristus nẽ Awa Uur sãf are, ĩ Kristus nẽ sã.
Israel idi momoiya sã bun toku to dibodõf are, idi baban aa oliv bun bagu fediyouf, ere nigin, Negur ĩ baban idi bagu fediya nigin kisi feleya.
Idi sigoredin idegẽya taka to wõ yen, idi bouweid bun od taka sã.
Anĩ ere, aya Naab idi idegẽya dedig anĩ dõ afe fen, tubuda tar neid Negur yana alesedig, are momoi auf. Aya Moses nẽ Lo ado, profet neid buk bun ditoton anĩ ganan nigin, momoi auf.
Wareg taka to utorõge di, ibodõf, abob nigin wauĩ laa fiya nẽ wareg dogol ã atun ibodõf, ere nigin, taka ĩ ne tã nigin wau laa fef, ĩ lo dõf kisi felef.
Idi uruwa totol bagai bunem ifalegnẽdi di, idi, Negur teneub daũ fiya nẽ sesen eneidi lo fedidig anĩ, yana kono difen, age de fen, idi waud falei ye fen, Negur yana yaleseya ditoron.
Taun are, yogon garaĩ odug ilun fen, bobog tuwelf ado. Agef fen, engel tuwelf bobog bun difaren. Bobog bun, Israel ibor tuwelf anidi yeneid itoton.
Kristus ĩ, ada fotokar isisĩya nẽ wõ ye fen, ada lo nẽ isisĩya bun temelada kel yaledan, ere nigin, Negur nẽ Itotoya eig ye irok, “Ganan aa bun diseginnẽdif, idi isisĩya farumen dibodok.”
Aya kulu Juda neid momoiya bun abod ken, naig be afen are ã karĩ gen. Aya Negur nẽ sios darau fatuk bagai afen ken, daũ afalauf nigin age afen.
Ĩ gogour odug, gogour kulu tamal bagai, are Devil be Satan dedig anĩ yale fen, tausen yar ifarauf nigin sen nem ifokelen.
Tamo taka yana Simon dedig an ibodon, ĩ taun anĩ bun idegẽya kosẽ inodidig, anĩ bunem Samaria tamo kayau ganan terẽ fiyẽdidig. Ĩ yogo nigin anĩ, aya tamo odug yedig.
Aya, Kristus nigin, yogon mata kel fãya nẽ megeir nigin ado, yogon darau bun ifareya nigin kelei ken, yogon laa bun ĩ gen wõ auf nigin orouf,
Tetedin imã inoya nigin to sibu wo, tunĩ neid mosor bun to kababal wo. Õ karẽ bagai ubodõf.
Age fiya bagai, kayau biyeideg karĩ del dibodõf nigin, taka dumen od to dirõf nigin, wain fatuk bagai to dãf nigin, agef fen, ereb biya anĩ difelnẽdiyouf nigin ufelneĩd.
Anĩ nigin, tamo ĩ kayau taulei yalef are, ĩ tutuk age fef, anĩ ere, tamo ĩ kayau to yalef are, ĩ tutuk bagai age fef.

Enei dumen, Jesus Galili an iyon, Judia distrik so fiyen, ere nigin, an Juda tamo ĩ dukesiyouf nigin ololo difen.
Negur nigin ã Kristus Jesus bun ubodõgef, Jesus ĩ ada nigin Negur bunem kisi biya wõ yen, are ada ĩ bunem madur bagai, fateul wowã tau fen, isennẽya talen.
Age fel fen, ĩ naan yale, beĩ bun yu ken, yogon dõ fiya tar yeid kulo fiya gariya inon, agef fen, taul luwa gu fen anim yeid waĩ fedin.
Aya Naab enei dõ difedig tamo kayau, darau afeneĩd fen, adenkesin, tamo ado kayau gei afeid fen, kalabus araran.
Anĩ nigin, tamo kayau Jesus nigin fara furu difen.

Negur nẽ sipsip ã farumen dibodok anĩ nẽ lo fiya tamo wõg fen, kabĩ mala nigin ge fen to lo wedigouf, anĩ ere, ã wauĩ iro ken, Negur ã ago gouf nigin orof kilei lo wedigouf. Moni nigin ge fen, to ago gouf, anĩ ere, aruneid yaleya nigin bagai fen, ago gouf.
Laa nẽ waila are mosor, mosor nẽ megeir are lo.

Ulegef! Kabĩ tamo ãgenei kabier kusu fiya nigin oroi dilen anĩ to na waledigen nigin, na yaleya nẽ wareg ã to wenẽdigen anim, ã nigin kaĩ ye fen, iron. Age dife di, oroi tamo aiteid, Odug saa ilun nẽ kusĩ tamo guri feid uyu iroudig anĩ, wederen ilen.

Ĩ fula fiya medeĩya ado safina meli meli, yogo nigin yalen kilei, darau ado wau gudũ fiya fatuk bagai wenẽgouf. Ĩ yogon wau bun, yogo yana yales fen, ‘Aya kuin abodok, aya waab sã, agef fen, aya to bagai wau gudũ fouf,’ yen.

Tamo ãg, age fiya bagai, aiweĩ tar geid ubodõg fen, idi nigin kisi gouf, are idi forõya nigin tamo wal fiya sã, idi dum mata ibodõya nẽ ege luwa wau ifenẽya, ã weim walogouf nigin, aniniya ado ago wiyẽdigouf, ago ge di, ãgenei kosẽya, ereb takam to naabura gudũ fouf.

Neu turau tar, ã kafĩ fiya sã ufaragauf nigin iweignein. Anĩ ere, ãgenei kafĩ fiya sã anĩ bunem, bouwa nẽ oroya to dõ gouf, age fiya ban, wauĩ laa fiya bunem, abob aruna walogouf.

Tubuid tar Abraham, Isak, Jakop are dogo neid, idi neid ibor anĩ isi isi Kristus wõ yen, Kristus ĩ Negur, ganan ĩ farumen dibodok, faimud ĩ yana talesauf! Momoi.
Amã darau malef are, anĩ ãgenei wauĩ yo fiya nigin ado, kel gei yeĩya nigin. Amã waumã yo fef are, anĩ ãgenei wauĩ yo fiya nigin, anĩ bunem darau de tekelei amãg malef anĩ, ã faali gef ulegef.
Negurem, amã ado ã, Kristus bun totol tafarauf nigin age fef. Ĩ igirnada fen, ada bun moul fi fel fen,
Ait anĩ baban Pita wogõ fiyen, “Ereb taka Negur ĩ amuyẽ sã inon anĩ, to amuyẽ ado wouf.”
“Tenebur nẽ king idi, ĩ geid seseirã tobonunã dino fen, yogon safina meli meli foi difen anidi, ĩ isaĩ di, kaau dile fen, idi ĩ nigin waud gudũf fen, inã logurouf.
Jesus iron, “Taka ĩ aya nigin wau laa fef, ĩ neu od dõ fouf. Neu Dei ĩ nigin wau laa fouf, anĩ amã ĩ gein masi, weim mabodõf.
Wau laa fiya are yeir. Ada Negur nigin wauda to laa fen, anĩ ere, ĩ ada nigin wau laaf fen, yogon Naal, neda mosor nigin Negur nẽ didi yo fiya nẽ sesewi fiya anĩ sur fen.
Anĩ ere, ĩ lalan bun ibodok gen, adag lalan bun tayõf are, ada abob geid nigal taũf, age tafe di, Negur Naal, Jesus nẽ naud anim, mosor ganan bun tamal kulo fadalauf.
Anĩ nigin, õ baban ferfer sã, õ in kesu. Õ in kesu ubodok nigin, Negur ĩ õg yogon akor walouf nigin ineyon.
Anĩ ere, Negur ĩ Naal nigin irok, “O Negur, ogon tano gai gai ibodkalauf, õ ogon tano tobonunã madur bagai bun lo wouf.
Juda tamo aiten dale diron, “Amã anidi taka nigin meein to tulu mayõf, anĩ ere, Negur kono fiya nigin, ere nigin, õ tamo maug anĩ, ‘aya Negur’ wof.”
Age fe di, dogo neid darau nẽ yãkaau fã ye, gai gai agef ibodkalauf. Idi gaar kuĩ ado yogon malakanon yana dalesedig anidi be, aib taka yogon yana nẽ uris yalen ĩ, naa be bõ, si inoya nẽ sain sã.”
Anĩ nigin, amã Negur nẽ wau yũya bunem kabĩ enei ado nigin, amã waumã bun to folo redig.
Anĩ nigin, ada kumĩ sã torõf, “Odug ĩ neu isennẽya, aya to kumĩ auf. Aya tamom ere naig fiyauf?”
Tamo ereb ereb ganan yõdig anim, ne tã sako dogol yõdig to kono fiyẽf, age fe di, tamo ereb ereb ganan to yõdig anim, tamo ereb ereb ganan yõdig bou bun od to yũf, ere nigin, Negur ĩ yalen.
Negur, morõ bun feseya sã ifareya ado wau yaleseya ifeneĩdig ĩ, ã Kristus Jesus dõg mog, ã atun wau tekelei nẽ uur ifeneĩf nigin aya orouf,

Pris mudur tunĩ ganan, naa ganan, dogo neid mosor nigin ket sesewi dife fen, tamo kayau neid mosor nigin sesewi difedig, anĩ ere, Jesus ĩ pris anidi gen sã. Ĩ yogo bouwa sesewi fen sain bun, ĩ idi neid mosor nigin sain tekelei dogol sesewi fen.
Aib taka ĩ safina ado fen, yogon tura lau fiya bun ibodok anĩ ile fen, ĩ nigin wau to yuk, Negur nẽ wau laa fiya naig fe ĩ bun ibodok?
Aya arok, ada kisi totol ado fen, ada bouwada enei tator ken, Odug geid takai tabodõf nigin orodaf bagai.
Turau tar oboiyou, aya ã tenebur ein yaũ tamo ado urug tamo gen anĩ, mosor nẽ oroya meleĩkanon geid kusĩ yedig anĩ so wiyẽgouf nigin, totol bagai arokeneik.
Tamo ganan anini wiyẽdigouf. Momoiya tureĩ tar nigin wauĩ laa fouf. Negur kumĩ ado anini wiyẽgouf. Agog fen, king anini wiyẽgouf.
Moses kisi fen, yogon tamo kayau keleĩ youf, are Negurem idi kafĩ fiya bun tamal gei fediyouf nigin, ĩ itonek, anĩ ere, idi to kelein.
Gaũ anidi nigin lo walagauf, tamo idi sane age difedig, idi mulũ ileya nigin bouweid gudũ difedig anidi.
Idi Negur keleĩ dedig, anĩ ere, nedi tobonuneid bun, idi Negur nigin wa difedig. Idi sane bagai, idodõya temeleid, idi ereb biya age fiya nigin kisi feleya sã.
Aya idi nigin kurõ afeis eig auf, idi Negur nigin kisi totol dinodig, anĩ ere, idi neid kisi totol are keleĩ bunem sã.
ĩ neda morõ ganan bun wauda yo fedig, anĩ nigin, ada dug wau yo fiya Negur bun tamal talen anĩ bunem, idi morõ adodo anidi waud yo tafedig.
Õ Negur mala bun, kabĩ tamo ile fen, de youf, are kabĩ tamo ĩ yogon kabĩ nigin to mama fouf, ĩ momoi od tutuk ifelnẽdiya nẽ kabĩ el fe irouwauf anĩ, wõ wouf nigin, kabĩ totol bagai walouf.
Ĩ kiwai ino fen, ereb ereb ganan waitou de fen, seli dabidig anĩ ĩ farumen ineneĩd fen, ĩ yogo Negur nẽ tempel bun ibod ken, ĩ yogo nigin Negur ye kurõ fesiyouf.
Tama tar, gereneĩ tar waud saneya to wenẽdig, age fiya ban, Odug nẽ tai fiya ado ifelnẽya bunem lo wedigouf.
Anĩ ere, enei ganan bun, ada, ĩ ada nigin wau laa fen bunem, ada kusĩ wal difen anidi wal fediya tabodok.
Amã ganan tenebur kuku mau fen, ait taka Hibru od nem eig ye irokana mog, karĩ aun, ‘Sol, Sol, ere nigin õ aya daig wiyaf? Õ aa waila ado bun yẽ urak are, õ nigin malai bagai.’
Ogon darau ado ogon maleg nigin aya keleĩ, anĩ ere, õ safina musei ado. Aya idi dogo nigin Juda tamo dedig, anĩ ere, idi Juda tamo sã, Satan nẽ guru fiya anidi neid bou yũya od nigin keleĩ.
Wau laa fiya anĩ sane nigin to kulĩ yedig, anĩ ere, momoi nigin kulĩ yedig.
Anĩ nigin, ereb ereb amuyẽ ganan ado, sesen ketẽ yesen ganan walelagauf, agog fen, wauĩ yukesileya bunem, od ã namein Negurem itenen, kel yaleyeĩf kisi feleya anĩ walogouf.
Ayam faat atenẽ di, Apolosem naan fen, anĩ ere, Negurem odugouf nigin age fen.
Anĩ dõ fiya engel takam dõ fiye ken, iron, “Ĩ kubũ yen! Babilon Odug kubũ yen, ĩ teneub ganan yogon seseirã tobonunã nẽ wain totol ifeneĩd don.”

Neu kesu tar, idegẽya waitou so wiyẽdigouf.
Age fediya anidim naab dimirek dile, fõ bun dile fen, kayau maleg didegneĩd, dogo neid kisi ulum diroukenẽdidig, kayau mosor beberikã anidi, oroya sane fire fire bun waud dalesedig,
Age fiya ban, ada wau laa fiya bun momoi anĩ wogõ tau fen, ereb ereb ganan bun Mudur ibodok bun biya daf iselauf, Mudur are Kristus.
Awa Uur maror bunem bagu yein anĩ uroug kafĩ walagauf nigin, kabĩ totol waleg.
Age ye di, Sol to fen, “Odug, õ aim?” Ĩ iron, “Aya Jesus, õ daig wiyaf anim.

Anĩ ere, ãgenei wauĩ bun Kristus ĩ Odug unogouf. Idi wauĩ iseya ã namein ibodok anĩ nẽ gariya karĩ douf nigin to diyeik anidi ganan solog urokenẽdigouf nigin, faimud dodok gouf. Anĩ ere, molol ado aniniya bunem enei agog fen,
“Age fe di, Odug Moses irokenen, ‘Ogon sendel unukakã, ere nigin, modoũ õ ufaref nẽ are fateul teneub.
Ereb ã gariya bunem karĩ gen anĩ, ã bun agef ibodõf nigin lo walagauf. Ago gouf are, ã Naal bun ado Dei buneg ubodõgouf.
Aya ã momoi bagai arokeneik, taka ĩ neu od irou kafĩ falauf are, ĩ laa to bagai gurug fouf.”
Anĩ bure fele di, aya king nẽ sia lalau odug ado, taka anĩ teten ibodon anĩ ailen. Teneub ado saa, ĩ mala iran nẽ waĩf yale di, idi modoũ san.
Taka irõf, “Saaf are te guroub nẽ, te guroub are saaf nẽ.” Anĩ ere, Negur anĩ ganan daũ falauf. Bouwa are noli tobonunã nẽ sã, anĩ ere, Odug nẽ, are Odug ĩ bouwa anĩ nẽ.
Age fiya bagai, ã aug nigin, mosor bun gareg fen, Kristus Jesus bunem, Negur bun mata ubodõgef anĩ kisi gouf.
Anĩ ere, Negur de mafiyẽf, ĩ faimud amã Kristus bun kusĩ wal fiya bun uyu iroukanamãdig, agef fen, ĩ, amã bunem, Kristus nigin keleĩ anĩ nẽ sumeĩ biya, modoũ ganan bun firagagaũ feledig.
Od enĩ, amã ĩ bun tamal karĩ mau fen, ã yaor mafe marokeneik: Negur ĩ lalan, ĩ bun gugum taka to ibodok.
Idi ganan Deim ifanaf, aya bun disiyouf, taka ĩ aya bun isif, aya to bagai aruwauf.
Abob nigin tureĩ tar gen, toku wauĩ laa fouf.
Age fiya nigin, idi ĩ bunem Negur garan disif anidi, ĩ el fe isenneĩd leya kisi feleya, ere nigin, ĩ mata faimud ibod ken, idi nigin Negur bun kosẽ yef.
Anĩ ere, idi diweig diron, “Uru uraile! Uru uraile! Aa tetek bun ũ!” Pailat to fen, “Aya ãgenei king aa tetek bun aũf de?” Pris odudug solo de diron, “Amã king taka sã, Sisa dogol.”
Age fiya gen, sain enei buneg, Negur wau ifenẽya bunem musei sã igirnẽdin anidi fau dibodok.
Tenebur nẽ king, ĩ geid seseirã tobonunã dino di, tamo kayau tenebur difaref anidi, yogon seseirã tobonunã nẽ wain bunem, idi meleid waĩ yen.”

Ada in gere tar ouf are, ada ereb el fiya biya Negur ifanadauf nigin promis od iron anĩ talouf. Ada Kristus geid weim yogon fula fiya medeĩyag talouf nigin ada momoi bagai ĩ geid weim yogon darau talouf are, ada Kristus geid weim ereb el fiya biya Negur ifanadauf nigin promis od iron anĩ talouf.
Uyu irouya sios nẽ kabĩ el de diroulef, yana biya ado mala solo biya bagai dalouf, are idi biya od wogõ def ado difelnẽdif anidi, age difouf bagai.

Anĩ ere, tamo ganan enei keleĩ sã. Tamo kayau tunĩ fau idegẽya waitou nigin fatuk bagai kisi difedig nigin, sain idi saaf anĩ doko, idi saaf anĩ idegẽya waitou bun sesewi difen de fen, kisi difedig, age dife di, idi waud totol sã nigin, amuyẽdig.
Were aya bun biya to yuk anĩ ganan, Deim kokour falauf, were biya yuk anĩ ganan, Deim dẽ fe di, biya musei imauf.
Idi ã gem lo wedigouf nigin inodin anidi to nugo wiyẽdigouf, anĩ ere, ã sipsip dileyei ken, dõ diyeĩf nẽ tobonuneĩ bun ago gouf.
Turamã tar, amã ã gare den onudi nigin to keleĩ youf anĩ to oromak, takag, tamo tunĩ ganan, wau iseya sã gen wauĩ gudũ fouf anĩ to oromak.
Momoiya bunem, Israel tamo kayau, teneub maug bun gen Maaĩ Giriya atu diyok dilen. Anĩ ere, Isip tamo idi dibal mog, naan kerub fedi di, gare den.
“Sain anĩ bun, Moses wõ yen, ĩ Negur mala bun kesu meli bagai. Ogõ towo, tama nẽ fõ bun kulatun difen.
Ĩg yogo felu yabidig nigin, idi to kelei ken, kũ difenek anidi, molol nem isennẽdiya kisi feleya.

Bõ are mogo sa kalau fenẽ, naa mogo wõ you fenẽ. Anĩ nigin, ada gugum nẽ tobonunã tator, yerin gadi tafel fen, lalan nẽ tobonunã biya anĩ dõ tafouf. Age tafe fen, ada, kusĩ nigin kusĩ nẽ naki totol difonũdig gen, tobonunã biya anĩ, ada bun ibodõf nigin age tafouf.
Marau tamo ã, ãgenei ferfer naab de anĩ bunem el wedigouf. To kumĩya wenẽdig, ere nigin, ã keleĩ, ã ado idi nigin, ãgenei Marau saa ilun ibodok, ĩ bun taka nigin dogol anĩ, kinau ya sã.
Idi waud kulĩ yef geid kulĩ gouf, idi inã dalef geid inã walogouf.
Anĩ ere, ogon waũ totol ado ogon waũ faleiya sã bunem, õ ogo nigin Negur nẽ didi wõ youf naa bun walouf nigin didi kuru wof, sain anĩ bun Negur nẽ es fiya madur bagai anĩ yaorouf.
Age dife di, Juda tamo tunĩ, Antiok ado Ikonium taun temeleid disi fen, tamo kayau musei waud dalen. Age de fen, idi Pol meein tulu difiyẽ, laa fel de fen, taun yerin diror diroulen.
Jesus od enei wogõ yel fen, ĩ wau moro ken, kurõ feis iron, “Aya ã momoi bagai arokeneik, ãgenei takam aya kiwai ifanauf.”

Anĩ ere, Negur nẽ Itotoya kurõ falaisi, tenebur tamo kayau ganan mosor nẽ kafĩ fiya bun difaref yef, are Negur nẽ promis Jesus Kristus nigin momoiya bunem ifenẽf anĩ, idi momoi def anidi ifenẽdiyouf nigin, Negur age fen.
Idi Negur nẽ od kurõ fesiya bure difele di, gaar kuĩ anĩ ku isil idĩya sã bunem ulõ yeis fen, idi geid kusĩ de, wal feid fen, idenkesiyouf.
Uruwa bun ada kisi totol adon anĩ, kafĩ tafel tarou, idikeleya bun talauf are, ada Kristus nẽ ereb ereb ganan weim talef.

Tubuĩ tar profet taka to darau difenen de? Tubuĩ tar idi, Madur Tamo anĩ fau isiyouf de fen, wogõ den tamo anidig didenkesin. Are gama Madur Tamo anĩ kiwai wenẽg fen, ukesigen.

Aya sisi fiya nẽ tibog gen werĩ taka ifana fen, irokanan, “Ule fen, Negur nẽ tempel ado alta sisi wo fen, Negur yana an ganim dalesedig anĩ uwes.

Eneidi are kayau geid yen ken, amuyẽ inoya sã anidi, ere nigin, idi dogo nigin karẽtut bagai dibodon. Idi Sipsip Naal narib ile di, idi dõ de diyõdig. Idi tamo ganan atun kel geif fen, faat uyulil yũya gen, Negur ado Sipsip Naal bun sesewi fedin.

Age fiyauf are, taka ĩ, Negur Naal ye nem lai fe fen, bar itenẽya nẽ naud anim ĩ mosor bun tamal kulo fiyekelen anĩ, fateul sã gen inene ken, wau ifenẽya nẽ Awa Uur kono fiyek ĩ, darau naig fiya bagai yalouf anĩ kisi gef.
