Odug nẽ ferfer to kusĩ youf bagai, age fiya ban, ĩ tamo kayau ganan nigin imatẽya ifelnẽdiyouf, ifelnẽdiya kisi feleyauf, to seye youf bagai.
Momoi, aya bouwaum ã geid to tabodok, anĩ ere, aya uur bun ã geid tabod ken, ã naig be ge tutuk ufareg fen, ãgenei Kristus bun momoiya naig be fe megeir ifaref anĩ, ileya nigin wau irok.
Ere nigin, Odug nẽ malam tamo madur bagai lo fedidig, agef fen, yogon weder dogo neid kosẽya anĩ karĩ yedig. Anĩ ere, Odug nẽ nawa, idi sane age difef anidi bun dudum fiyẽdidig.”

Anĩ ere, amã faimud, ã, turamã tar Odug nẽ oboi nigin, Negur de mafiyẽf bagai, ere nigin, gariya bun, Negur, Awa Uur ã fateul ineneĩya nigin kabĩ yalef bunem ado, ã momoi nẽ nigin momoi gef bunem, kel gei yeĩf nigin igirnein.

Aib ĩ mosor inof, utornẽg len, ĩ agef mosorei youf. Aib ĩ sane age fef, utornẽg len, ĩ sane agei fouf. Aib ĩ biya age fef, utornẽg len, ĩ biya agei fouf. Aib ĩ fateul ibodok, utornẽg len, ĩ fateulei youf.”
Pita solof irokenẽdin, “Ã mugu mugu wauĩ falei wog fen, Jesus yana bunem naan iguneĩ di, ãgenei mosor nigin weder tu kalauf, ago ge di, ege luwa are Awa Uur Fateul walogouf.
Taka nem taka nẽ mosor to solo fouf, anĩ ere, abob nigin ado ganan nigin, faimud tobonunã biya ago gouf.
Age fiya bagai, tamog Negur kayau ado bagu fedin anĩ ditor ken, idi abob bun noli nigin yã gaĩ de genen. Tamo, tamo tunĩ geid mama tobonunã age dife fen, idi neid idodõya mala darau dogo ke de dalen.
Anĩ nigin, ãg wauĩ al fe fen, aya geid wauda kulĩ youf.
Anĩ nigin, wauĩ falei ge fen, Negur bun uleg, anĩ bunem ãgenei mosor isasalauf. Ago gouf, wauĩ mata wõya nẽ sain Odug bunem isi fen,
Naa taka bun, yogon bobog taka to bagai inolalauf, ere nigin, an bõ sãf.
Taka ĩ neu bouwau yokon, neu naudou yoko, ĩ mata faimud ibodkeleya ado, anĩ aya fau idikeleya naa bun alesnẽf.
Jesus solof iron, “Ilun tamal megeir õ to ifonom are, aya ogon megeir farumen to abodom. Anĩ nigin, tamo taka ĩ aya õ imã bun inenan, ĩ yogon mosor odug bagai, ogon wal fiya.”
Naab age fiya bagai, momoiya yogo dogol, dõ fiya bunem to isennek, are laa fef.

Mosor nẽ bouwa felu reya nigin, lo anim age fiya nigin kisi feleya sã anĩ Negur age fen, are ĩ yogon Naal, mosor tamo nẽ bouwa gen bun, mosor yaleleya nẽ sesewi fiya ibodõf nigin sur fiyen anĩ bunem, Negur ĩ, mosor, mosor tamo nẽ bouwa bun ibodok anĩ nẽ megeir yukesin,
Anĩ ere, ã ereb madur nigin darau walogoufeg, ã el yeik. “Ereb idi kumĩ def anĩ to kumĩg, to morõ yeĩf.”
Tama, ã gereneĩ tar to waud saneya wenẽdigouf, ago gouf, idi agogon de fen, waud to al fouf.
Ĩ ait odugem, totol bagai iweig iron: “Kubũ yen! Babilon Odug kubũ yen! Ĩ, kaa sesen neid fõ, kaa sesen ganan neid fõ ado, ninã amuyẽ ado ninir sane to ile oroya ganan neid fõ falei fen.
Ai anĩ idegẽya tamo? Tamo, Jesus ĩ Kristus yeya anĩ wa fef anĩ. Tamo age fiya, are Kristus nẽ kiwai. Ĩ, Dei ado Naal wa fedif.
Anĩ nigin, taka ĩ tutuk sã bret anĩ yãf be, Odug nẽ kap bun yãf are, ĩ Odug nẽ bouwa ado naud bun mosor inouf.
Õ neneya bagai, õ momoiya dõ fiya sã are, ege bagai ya anĩ keleĩ you fenẽ de?

Anĩ nigin, Judas, kusĩ tamo tunĩ ado, tempel lo fiya tamo tunĩ pris mudur adodo Farisia tamo geid idim sur difedin anidi geif fen, kabier uyu ile di, dilen. Idi yal, lam, kusĩ nẽ waila guri de fen, dilen.
Anĩ ere, Odug ĩ yogon od dõ fiya biya, ĩ ã megeir ifenei ken, Satan bun tamal kulatun yeĩf.
Sain ĩ mayarẽ dinenẽ di, Farao ne baraim yalen, ĩ yogon kesu ouf nigin yale iroulen.
Agef fen, engel aa gaula sumeĩ biya nẽ beĩ yale, alta bun tamal yã ife fen, tenebur iran, age fe di, kolimei gudũya, gurũya odug, kolimei filiya ado, mimĩ wõ yen.

Teneub ganan, yogon seseirã tobonunã nẽ wain totol don. Tenebur nẽ king, ĩ geid seseirã tobonunã dinon, age fe di, tenebur nẽ bisnis tamo idi, yogon safina nigin oroya totol ado bunem, safina musei dalen.”
Anĩ nigin, Juda idi tempel modoũ bun daleya fen, dinakesiyou fenẽ nigin age difen.
Idi fau momoi anĩ ditor ken, wedereid fitok du ken, nenerĩ ege anĩ karĩ douf.
Anĩ ere, ã tunĩ momoiya sã.” Ere nigin, Jesus idi nigin gariya bun kelein, aiyaim ĩ nigin to momoi den, aim ĩ nigin kiwai inouf.
Jesus aiten yale iron, “Tamo bret enei beĩ bun nu afe fen, afenẽf anĩ.” Age ye fen, ĩ bret nuf fen, Judas Iskariot, Simon naal ifenen
Timoti, ereb ereb õ bun inon anĩ kulatun wo. Momoiya sã neid od ado, kiwai kisi are idegẽya bunem keleĩ biya dedig anĩ so wiyẽ,

Anĩ ere, Juda tamo, Pol Sailas ado kiyeĩ difeneĩd fen, maket modoũ bun tamo sesen tunĩ kuru difeid waud dalese di, tamo kayau guru difalasi fen, taun anĩ bun kakaĩ den. Idi Pol Sailas ado, tamo kayau bun diroulediyouf nigin, Jeson nẽ fõ bun dile dimirnẽdin.

Aib taka ĩ yogon tura mosor laa bun to irouledig anĩ ino mog, ilouf are, ĩ tura nigin kosẽ ye di, Negur tura mata ifenẽf. Aya idi nedi mosor laa bun to guri feid irouledig anidi nigin wogõ auf. Mosor laa bun guri feid irouledig are ibodok. Aya mosor anĩ nigin kosẽ youf nigin to wogõ auf.
Aya ã momoi bagai arokeneik, taka ayam sur afe di, ĩ yalef are, ĩ aya yaleyaf, taka ĩ aya yaleyaf are, ĩ aya sur fiyan anĩ yalef.”
Ada tano yokũ fiya kisi feleya sã anĩ talef, anĩ nigin, Negur de tafiye ken, Negur wau al fouf nigin, kumĩ ado aniniya bunem, Negur seli tabiyouf,

Juda tamo tunĩ, kaa sesen dirudiyouf nigin diyõdig, idi kaa sesenem dirounẽdin anidi bun Odug Jesus yana dale fen, idi eig de dirõdig, “Jesus ĩ nigin Pol wogõ yedig, ĩ yana bunem, aya õ ulõ wesiyouf nigin arokonok.”
anĩ ere, Pol ĩ Sailas igirnẽ di, momoiya tamo kayaum Odug nẽ wau ifenẽya bun dinenẽdi di, dilen.
Ã nigin amã kabĩ totol maledig anĩ, ege kilẽ to ilauf nigin ado, ã mala solo kisi feleya bagai walogouf nigin lo walagauf.

Tamo eneidi saa katĩ feleya nẽ megeir ado nigin, idi profet od wogõ douf sain, uyẽ to isiyouf, agef fen, idi naan falei fe di, naud wõya nigin megeir ado fen, ereb sain orodif kilei, idi ereb sane fire fire bunem teneub yũya nẽ megeir ado.
Õ amã nemã kabĩ bun, amã geid katõ tekelei sã, nemã kabĩ taka to walef, ere nigin, Negur mala bun waũ tutuk sã.
Neu ganan are ogon, ogon are neu. Idi bunem, aya fula fiya medeĩya alel.
Ganan Negur nẽ naab fasis dife fen, ganan sesen len; aibem taka to biya age fedig, tekelei bagaig sã.”
Aug nigin dogol be, ege yeneĩ yaleseya bunem ereb taka to ago gouf, anĩ ere, wauĩ yukesileya bun, ã aug nigin kisi gef anĩ wal fiya, taka nigin agog kisi gouf.
Lam tutur anĩ atun, aib taka “tamo naal gen” kolos meluk ifonũ di, yen isilen ado, let gol akor gu fen anĩ ifaren.
Isisĩya taka baban to ibodõf. Negur nẽ ado Sipsip Naal nẽ king nẽ sia are, taun namen ibodõf, age fe di, yogon ferfer idi, in aruna dalouf.
Ereb ereb ganan nẽ idikeleya naa mogo melsak. Anĩ nigin, ã kosẽ gouf nigin, kisi el ge waleg fen, aug nigin biya kulatun gouf.
Idi Ataliam waag dale, Antiok keku de dilen, kulu an, sios, kabĩ gama bure difelel anĩ nigin, aposel idi Negur nẽ wau ifenẽya bun dinenẽdin.

Anĩ ere, õ kayau walef are, õ mosor to unof. Kayau taulei taka tamo yalef are, ĩ mosor to inof. Anĩ ere, tamo kayau dalef, kayau tamo dalef, idi mata ibodõya enei bun morõ musei dalouf, are aya morõ enei ã bun to wõ youf anĩ orouf.
Ere nigin, ada neda kusĩ are, bouwa ado naud nẽ oroya fe fiyẽya nigin sã, anĩ ere, uyu iroudiya, yeneid adodo, tenebur nẽ gugum nẽ megeir ado, saa ilun kaa sesen nẽ megeir nẽ totol fe fiyẽya nigin.
Ã taka kisi biya nigin lau fouf, Negur tamo ganan kisi biya nigin lau de fen to difiyẽf anĩ to ou fiyeĩd fen, wau sã kisi biya kisi feleya ifenẽdidig anĩ to fiyẽf, age fe di, ĩ ifenẽf.
Awa Uur nẽ yã to uroroukeleg,
Salafat taka dinon. Aab malabag anĩ bun, yal nẽ tibog, tebol ado, bret sesewi difen anĩ an ifaredin, modoũ are Modoũ Fateul dedig.

Aya õ arokonok, õ aya bun gol bagai, gol yã bun difalegen anĩ, õ safina ganan kisi feleya bagai wõ wouf nigin, na walouf, õ kolos lalaug ufonũ di, ogon gemũ mama dede wouf nigin na walouf, õ mala marasin malã bun uno fen, kelẽ walauf nigin na walouf.
Aya, ã Negur Naal nẽ yana nigin momoi gef anĩ, mata ibodkeleya ã bun ibodok anĩ, ã keleĩ youf nigin enei atotkeneik.
Taka ĩ yogon kisim wogõ yef are, ĩ yogo yana yaleseya nigin age fef, anĩ ere, taka ĩ sur fiyen nẽ yana yaleseya nigin kabĩ yalef, tamo are momoi nẽ. Ĩ bun idegẽya taka sã.
Anĩ ere, amã nameman mis namen gen, safina biya bagai enei ado, are ereb ereb ganan wal fiya nẽ megeir, are amã nemã sã, Negur nẽ anĩ yaorouf nigin.

Neu oboiyou tar, ã aug mala solo to wenẽdigouf, anĩ ere, Negur nẽ didi nigin modoũ unogouf, ere nigin, Negur nẽ Itotoya bun eig ya ibodok, “Odug irok, mala solo ifenẽya are neu. Ayam mala solo afenẽf.”
Jesus aitedin yale iron, “Aya yug selu alesauf are, neu seli alef are ege. Neu Dei, ĩ anĩ ãgenei Negur gef, ĩ aya yanau yalesedig.
Saaf bunem Negur nẽ kabĩ to daũ gouf. Saaf ganan amuyẽ sã, anĩ ere, tamo ĩ saaf yõya bunem, ne tã, Negur nigin momoiya nẽ naab dõf mog ye isog yale di, kubũ youf, are sane.
Idi urom Jesus bouwa dale, marasin ado gabar lalau nem filu difen. Juda neid tamo mũ fiya tobonunã bunem age difen.

Ã tamo kalabus bun dibodon anidi nigin wauĩ yũya wenẽdigen, agog fen, tamo idi ãgenei safina ganan dale di, ã kulĩya ado folõ wol kenẽdigen, ere nigin, ã keleĩ, ã aug safina biya, mata gai gai ibodkeleya nẽ ado.
“Negur ĩ age afouf yen kilei, Dawid nẽ ibor nẽ tubu tar bun tamal, kel yaleya tamo Jesus Israel ifenẽdin.
Anĩ ere, Negur nẽ Itotoya eig ye irok kilei: “Negur nigin waud laa fedig idi nigin Negur dodok fen anĩ, malam taka to ilen, weder takam to karĩ yen, kisi takam to fokõ yen.”

Ĩ Jesus tamo gare den bun tamal, kel turĩ fiyen anĩ nẽ Awa Uur, ã namein ibodõf are, ĩ Kristus tamo gare den bun tamal, kel turĩ fiyen, yogon Awa Uur ã namein ibodok anĩ bunem, ãgenei bura leya nẽ bouweĩ matag ifeneĩf.
Awa Uur yogo, ada neda uur bun kurõ falaisi, ada Negur nẽ gere tar yedig.
Takam to idegneĩf: Takam Negur iseilnẽya kisi feleya sã. Tamo ĩ ereb itenek de anĩ yaledig.

Anĩ nigin, Negur nẽ molol ado wau itenẽya nigin kisi gouf, ĩ idi kubũ den anidi bun wau itenen, anĩ ere, ã in molol bun toku ubodõgouf are, ĩ ã bun molol ibodõf. Anĩ ere, ã in molol bun to ubodõgouf are, ãg kokour yeikalauf.

Anĩ nigin, turau tar, to fese gef uleg, Odug nẽ isiya sain wõ youf. Saaf kabĩ yaleya tamo, teneub bun saaf biya bagai wõ youf nigin, naig fe tarif fen, uyẽ uruwan isif ile idikeledig anĩ atun, naig fe feseya sã tarif fen, kabĩ yaledig anĩ uleg.
Odug, Onesiforus nẽ ibor bun wau yũya ifelnẽdiyouf nigin aya orouf, ere nigin, ĩ sain musei wau filolõ fiya bunem el fiyadig, aya kokolin difiyan nigin to mama fen.
Neu kesu tar, gama ĩ bun agog ubodõgouf, ago ge di, ĩ wõ youf sain bun, ĩ isi di, ĩ mala bun, ada kumĩ sã ado mama sã tafarauf.
Anĩ nigin, aya orok, Awa Uur bunem ubodõgouf, ago gouf are, ã bouwa nẽ oroya to dõ gouf.
Od enei momoi bagai, ganan dale fen, momoi douf nigin: Kristus Jesus mosor tamo kel gei fiya nigin tenebur isin. Idi atun aya sane bagai, idi ganan wal fediya.
Od idĩya nigin, Odug bun ado yogon megeir barikã bun, totol ufareg.
Anĩ nigin, taka ĩ kisi fef, totol ifaref yef, ĩ to kubũ youf nigin lo falauf.
Ĩ sesewi fe, tekelei felen anim, idi mosor bun temeleid kulo feledif anidi, gai gai nigin madur feledin.
Juda tamo baban ĩ meein tulu difiyẽf nigin, meein gei difen.
Anĩ ere, aya ã eig fiya anĩ keleĩ youf nigin orouf, are tamo ganan neid mudur are Kristus, kayau nẽ mudur are tamo, Kristus nẽ mudur are Negur.
Tunĩ kono fiya ado tibog dalen, tunĩ sen nem difofa ken, kalabus bun dinenẽdin.
Wau iseya enei are, ada maladakanon nẽ anka, are totol fen, to gebe yedig. Are anim, gabar tempel namen ibodok anĩ borũ fel, modoũ fateul bagai bun iledig.
Ereb gugum bun tamal tobonunã faat biya sã anĩ geid to nigal ũgouf, anĩ ere, yaor wedigouf.

Turau tar, ã abob, õ sane to wiyẽg. Taka ĩ, tura, õ sane fiyek be, es fiyek, ĩ lo are sane ye fen, lo es fiyek. Ã lo es wiyẽgouf are, ã lo dõ fiya tamo sã, anĩ ere, ã lo nẽ marau gen wowãg fen, ã aug tamo es wiyẽgedif.
Bobog tuwelf are maaĩ tuwa meli bagai pel tuwelf, bobog teke tekelei, maaĩ tuwa meli bagai pel teke tekelei nem inon. Taun nẽ naab odug are, galas karẽtut bagai gen, gol bagai nem dogol inon.
Anĩ ere, Kristus ĩ Negur Naal, ĩ Negur ait el fe dõf fen, Negur nẽ fõ lo fedig. Anĩ nigin, ada toku totol tano fen, wauda isef anĩ nigin yanada talesef anĩ tarou tokõ tafalauf are, ada yogon fõ.
Wau laa fiya are mala yaleya sã. Ereb sane anĩ seseg fen, ereb biya anĩ kafĩ weleg.

Sain anĩ bun bagai, mimĩ odug wõ ye di, taun anĩ bun ten tekelei adok daũ felen. Sewen tausen tamo kayau mimĩ anim idenkesin. Age fe di, idi gareya sã are kumĩ tererẽ de fen, saa ilun nẽ Negur fula fiya medeĩya difenen.
Atun tamo ĩ, tamo foi fiya tekelei nẽ dogol to ibodõdig. Anĩ ere, Negur ĩ tekelei dogol, ĩ yogo bagai Abraham promis anĩ ifenen. (Anĩ bun, atun tamo taka to ibodok.)
Pailat Jesus irokenen, “Õ aya od to urokanauf de? Aya õ kafĩ fiya bun tamal yalelnõya nigin megeir ado, õ aa tetek bun inõya nigineg megeir ado anĩ, õ keleĩ sã de?”

Faat korõ feleya tamo are, Negur nẽ Itotoya bun yenek enei iwesen: “Ĩ sipsip dukesiyouf nigin dirou dilen gen dirou dilen, ĩ, sipsip momou siwi gudũ fiya tamo wagen dẽ yeledig gen, od taka to wogõ yen.
Anĩ bure fele di, tamo kayau king nigin dirõ di, Negur, Sol Kis naal, Benjamin nẽ ibor bun tamal ifenẽdin, Sol foti yar king ibodon.
Ere nigin, an idodõya tamo, od kaũ sã, idegẽya temeleid musei difaref, idi atun mulũ bun temeleid anidim age difedig bagai.
Anĩ namen, gaar fire fire yeid imeid adodo, gaar luwedim diyõdig ado, ninã ilun temeleid dibodon.
Fula fiya medeĩya õ wanan anĩ, idi afenẽdin, are ada tekelei gen, idig tekelei youf nigin.
Ereb aya bun tamal karĩ won, ifelnẽya biya anĩ, Kristus Jesus bun momoiya waũ laa fiya ado, el wo dõ fen, urou.
Nodin meein gulub sigis naan ifotũya nẽ difaren, are Juda neid tobonuneid bun imeid kulo fiya nigin, idi teke tekelei 100 lita age fiya naan iroudig.
Kisi biya bun kel usig ufareg fen, mosor inoya utorõg, ere nigin, ã atun tunĩ Negur nigin keleĩ sã difaref. Aya ã mama yeĩf nigin enei wogõ auf.
Ã wauĩ adok ukalaisileg fen, molol bagai ubodõgouf. Ã to feseg, wauĩ laa fiya bun abob nẽ morõ uteĩgouf.
Tunĩ yã bun tamal gurar ge gei wedigouf. Agog fen, tunĩ bun wauĩ yũya aniniya ado ufelnẽdigouf. Anĩ ere, dogo neid kolos, bouwa nẽ oroya sanem amuyẽ iroun anĩ utorõg.
Ada keleĩ, ereb ereb ganan bun, Negur yogo nigin waud laa fedig anidi neid biya fiya nigin Negur kabĩ yaledig, idi yogon oroya kilei iweignẽdin anidi.
Tamo ganan ãgenei Negur nẽ od dõ fiya biya anĩ karĩ den, anĩ nigin, aya ã nigin wau fatuk bagai kulĩ yef, anĩ ere, aya ã ereb biya nigin kisi biya waleg fen, sane nigin soso gouf anĩ orouf.

an gol alta aa gaula sumeĩ nigin tõ fiyadig ado, bar itenẽya nẽ bogis gol nem ganan kerũ feleya ibodon. Bogis enei bun, gol darum mana ado, Aron nẽ manig sana wõ yen ado, meein bedu bar itenẽya itoton ado ifaredin.
Age fiyauf are, yana yaleseya anĩ nain? Yana yaleseya are sã. Ere gariya bunem? Lo dõ fiya bunem de? Sã, momoiya bunem.
Aya Dei bun abodok, Dei aya bun ibodok anĩ to momoi wof de? Od aya wogõ ayeik are, aya yug bun tamal sã, are Dei aya bun ibodok ĩ kabĩ yalef.
Age de di, tamo kayau, idi geid bagu de fen, Pol Sailas ado kiwai difenẽdin. Age dife di, Rom es fiya tamo kolos dinukaka keneĩd fen, wagagã difediyouf nigin dirokenẽdin.
“Aya ĩtãfiya mata afeneik, abob nigin wauĩ laa fouf. Aya ã nigin wau laa fedig kilei, ãg abob nigin wauĩ laa fouf bagai.
Ada keleĩ, tenebur nẽ salafat ada anĩ namen tabodõdig anĩ narĩ fouf are, ada fõ taka Negur bun tamal ado, are saa ilun oun faimud ibodkeleya nẽ fõ, are tamo imam inoya sã.
Jesus iweig iron, “Tamo ĩ aya nigin momoi yef, ĩ aya nigin dogol to momoi yef, ĩ aya sur fiyan nigineg momoi yef.
Ananias solof iron, “Odug, aya tamo enĩ nẽ od, Jerusalem oun ogon tamo kayau fateul daig fiyẽdin, are museim mogo dirokana di, karĩ aun.
Tamo kayau dogo nigin waud laa fouf, moni nigin waud laa fouf, yeneid dalesauf, aya aya yeya, Negur kono difouf, sineid temeid sigoreid wal difouf, disennẽdi di to de difiyẽdiyouf, fateul to dibodõf,
Gama yogon naud bunem, Negur ada madur bagai yen nigin, ada ĩ bunem Negur nẽ didi bun tamal baban momoi bagai yalelkanadauf!
Odug Jesus kisi fokõ fel kana di, aya momoi bagai kisi afef, are saaf, Negur mala bun amuyẽ ado taka to ibodok. Anĩ ere, taka ĩ saaf taka amuyẽ ado youf are, ĩ yogo bun saaf anĩ amuyẽ ado.
Ereb ereb enei turã tar bun ufelnẽdiyouf are, momoiya od ado ifelnẽya biya dõ wodig anim megeir ifonõ di, Kristus Jesus nẽ kabĩ tamo biya wõ wouf.
